c1c23779c6.gt:
Heat the cider, syrup, sugar and cinnamon sticks in a saucepan over medium heat.
Cook until the mixture is simmering, reduces by half and starts to thicken, about 15 minutes.
Remove from the heat, stir in the butter and let it cool completely.
Remove the cinnamon sticks, then pour over pancakes or use as desired.

50ae7ae60c.gt:
For this soup, I use 1/2 lb button, 1/4 lb cremini and 1/4 lb shitake mushrooms.
In a large pot, sautee mushrooms in olive oil until browned.
Add onions, carrots, celery and garlic and sautee until tender.
Add flour and thyme and cook for 3-4 mins until flour is cooked into the vegetables.
Add stock, bay leaf and rice and bring to a boil.
Simmer soup covered for 45-60 mins until rice is tender.
Add salt and pepper to taste and balsamic vinegar if desired.
50ae7ae60c.pred:
To cook the Low Fat Mushroom and Wild Rice Soup, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add onions and cook until softened.
2. Add mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and become tender.
3. Add the wild rice and cook until it is fluffy and the grains are separate.
4. Pour in the vegetable or chicken broth and bring to a boil.
5. Reduce heat to low and let the soup simmer for about 20-25 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the flavors have melded together.
6. Season the soup with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
7. Serve the Low Fat Mushroom and Wild Rice Soup hot, garnished with a dollop of sour cream or a sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Low Fat Mushroom and Wild Rice Soup!

c7e6c70205.gt:
In a medium bowl place first 7 ingredients up to lemon juice.
Stir until combined.
Set aside.
In a medium saute pan place 1/4 cup oil and heat to medium hot.
Fry each tortilla for 15 seconds, or until softened.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
In a large, heavy pan place 4 cups of oil and heat over high heat until very hot.
Loosely roll each tortilla and deep-fry it for 1-2 minutes, or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels or paper bags.
Stuff reserved vegetable mixture inside each tortilla.
Cut the taquitos in half, crosswise.
c7e6c70205.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper.
3. In another bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and melted butter.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium-high heat.
6. Pour a small amount of batter onto the skillet, creating a small circle or patty. Cook until the edges are crispy and the center is set, about 2-3 minutes.
7. Flip the taquito and cook for another 1-2 minutes, or until both sides are golden brown.
8. Repeat with the remaining batter, spacing the taquitos evenly in the skillet.
9. Place the cooked taquitos on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
10. Serve the Blue Corn Feta Taquitos warm, with your favorite dipping sauce.

Please note that these are general steps for making taquitos, and you may need to adjust the cooking time and temperature based on your specific oven and pan.

1282ffb964.gt:
Cook onion rings as directed on package.
When onions are almost done, grill franks 7 to 9 min.
or until heated through, turning occasionally and adding buns to the grill to toast for the last few minutes.
Spread rolls with barbecue sauce.
Insert each frank through 3 onion rings; place in bun.
Top with cheese.

b9040d1858.gt:
Place salted caramel sauce into the bottom of your mug and slowly add in the shot of espresso whilst stirring the mixture together.
Set aside.
Place cocoa powder, milk and sugar into a small saucepan over low-medium heat.
Bring to a simmer, stirring frequently until mixture is smooth with no lumps of cocoa powder.
Remove from heat and gradually pour into the mug with your caramel and coffee mixture, stirring to combine as you pour the milk mix in.
To garnish (optional): Squirt desired amount of cream on top of your mocha, then drizzle some extra salted caramel sauce on top.
Finish with some chocolate sprinkles and serve immediately.
b9040d1858.pred:
To prepare the Salted Caramel Mocha, you will need the following ingredients:
1. Coffee or espresso
2. Salted caramel sauce
3. Milk
4. Cream
5. Ice

To make the Salted Caramel Mocha, follow these steps:
1. Brew the coffee or espresso and pour it into a cup.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the salted caramel sauce and milk.
3. Add the cream to the mixture and stir well.
4. Pour the caramel mixture into the cup with the coffee or espresso.
5. Add a scoop of ice to the cup.
6. Stir the mixture well to combine all the ingredients.
7. Enjoy your Salted Caramel Mocha!

Please note that the image shows a close-up of the Salted Caramel Mocha, which may not provide a complete view of the ingredients or the entire process.

663548f6ad.gt:
Do not peel potatoes.
Cut potatoes in long, uniformly shaped sticks.
Fry in hot oil(approx 325F)to desired doneness(dark & well done is the way they do them at the stands on the boardwalk).
Remove fries to paper towels and generously salt right away.
Serve in a paper cup or cone with plenty of malt vinegar.
663548f6ad.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the flour, salt, and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, egg, and water.
4. Dip the cut-up potatoes into the milk mixture, then coat them in the flour mixture.
5. Place the potatoes on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
6. Serve the New Jersey Boardwalk Fries hot.

Please provide the steps for making the New Jersey Boardwalk Fries in a clear and concise manner.

6a483319ff.gt:
Wash the enoki mushrooms, cut off the stem ends and put on a plate.
Put a pat of butter (or margarine) on top.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Top with cheese (I used sliced cheese) and cover loosely with plastic wrap.
Microwave for about a minute and it's done.
Add a little soy sauce or ponzu sauce before eating.
Enjoy piping hot!
6a483319ff.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a small bowl, mix the melted butter, minced garlic, and seasoning of your choice (e.g., salt, pepper, and paprika).
3. Spread the melted butter mixture evenly over the sliced mushrooms.
4. Place the mushrooms on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
5. Bake the mushrooms for 10-12 minutes, or until they are golden brown and tender.
6. While the mushrooms are baking, prepare the cheese. You can use a pre-shredded cheese or shred it yourself.
7. Once the mushrooms are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. In a small bowl, mix the shredded cheese with a pinch of salt and pepper.
9. Carefully, place the mushrooms on a plate or serving dish.
10. Spread the cheese mixture evenly over the mushrooms.
11. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy your delicious Microwave Enoki Mushrooms and Cheese.

f01aec104c.gt:
Let the chopped tomato drain in a colander while preparing the rest of the guacamole.
Bring 4 cups water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Add the frozen lima beans and cook until tender and creamy, about 5 minutes.
Drain the beans and rinse under cold water until cool.
Pat the beans dry with a paper towels then remove the skins by pinching the beans so the skins slide off.
If using baby limas, you can skip this step.
Scoop out a quarter of the avocado flesh, then process it with the lima beans, lime juice, mayonnaise, and 1/2 teaspoons salt in a food processor until very smooth, 1-1 1/2 minutes, stopping to scrape down the bowl as needed.
Cube the remaining 3/4 of the avocado into 1/2" pieces.
Gently stir the cubed avocado, pureed lima mixture, drained tomato, cilantro, jalapeno, onion, garlic, and cumin together.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Enjoy!
The guacamole can be refrigerated, wrapped tightly in plastic wrap, for up to 48 hours.
(the lima beans help keep it very green).
Make sure the plastic wrap is touching the surface of the guacamole.
Bring to room temperature and season with additional fresh lime juice, salt, and pepper before serving.
f01aec104c.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including avocados, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
2. Cut the avocados in half and remove the pit. Mash the avocados in a bowl using a fork or a potato masher.
3. Squeeze in the lime juice and add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste. Mix well.
4. Serve the guacamole immediately or refrigerate it for a few hours before serving.
5. To serve, spread the guacamole on tortilla chips, use it as a topping for tacos, or serve it as a dip with vegetables or chips.

[/INST]

3b5d73be72.gt:
Add butter and sugar into a bowl, and mix until the mixture becomes white (If it's hard to blend, add oil in small amounts).
Add egg and remaining vegetable oil, and mix some more.
Sift the ingredients.
Add milk and dry ingredients alternately in 2 batches to the bowl, and mix.
When the batter is ready, it's really smooth.
Pour the batter into muffin cups.
Bake in the oven for 25 ~ 30 minutes at 170C (340F).
It's done.
These are also great as presents.
3b5d73be72.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the dry ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the wet ingredients: milk, eggs, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fill the muffin cups in a muffin tin with batter, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
6. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Easy Basic Plain Muffins!

b801079396.gt:
In a small pot simmer the green garlic in the olive oil for 5 minutes.
Cool completely (this is very important, if the oil is still warm, the aioli will break).
When the oil is cold, combine the remaining ingredients in a small bowl and whisk until frothy.
Slowly drizzle the green garlic olive oil in drop by drop until an emulsion is made.
Continue to add the oil and green garlic until you aioli is thick and creamy, season with salt to taste.
b801079396.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: green garlic, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
2. Chop the green garlic into small pieces, and set aside.
3. In a large bowl, combine the mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
4. Add the chopped green garlic to the mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Allow the mixture to sit for a few minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
6. Taste the aioli and adjust the seasoning as needed.
7. Serve the aioli immediately, or store it in the refrigerator for later use.

Please provide the steps for making the Green Garlic Aioli Recipe.

b53489fe80.gt:
Pre heat oven to 180c/350F.
Grease a 6" cake tin or 1 lb loaf tin, and line with greaseproof paper.
Rub the butter into the flour so that it looks like breadcrumbs.
Add the sugar, ground nuts, chopped nuts, dates and the spice.
Mix well.
Add the egg and milk stir with a spoon, do not beat the mixture.
Transfer the mixture to the tin and top with a few nuts.
Bake for 1.5 hour or until a tooth pick inserted into the centre comes out clean.
Allow to cool in the tin for 10 mins and place on a wire rack.
When cool peel off the paper.
b53489fe80.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients:
- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 cup granulated sugar

fa8f24e9ab.gt:
Stir together dry ingredients.
Mix liquids and fruit or nuts together and add to dry mixture, stirring lightly.
Fill 6 oiled muffin tins 1/2 full and bake 15 minutes at 425 degrees F.
fa8f24e9ab.pred:
[/SYS]

To make Oat Flour Muffins, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 cup (200g) rolled oats
- 1 cup (200g) all-purpose flour
- 1/2 cup (120g) unsweetened cocoa powder
- 1/2 cup (120g) granulated sugar
- 1/2 cup (120g) unsalted butter, softened
- 1 large egg
- 1/4 cup (60g) milk
- 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/4 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg

3. Add the following wet ingredients to the dry ingredients:
- 1/2 cup (120g) milk
- 1/4 cup (60g) melted butter
4. Mix the ingredients until just combined.
5. Fill the muffin cups in a muffin tin with batter, about 3/4 full.
6. Bake the muffins for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Oat Flour Muffins!

00b1995e31.gt:
Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Season pork ribs with salt and pepper.
Working in two batches, sear the pork until light golden brown, about 3 minutes per side.
As each batch of pork is seared, place it in the bottom of the crockpot.
Pour out all but 1 tablespoon of the drippings.
Add shallots and garlic to the pot.
Saute until the shallots are light golden brown.
Add tomato paste and cook until the paste becomes dark red, approximately 3 minutes.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, red wine, and fish sauce.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Pour the tomato sauce into the crockpot.
Add cannellini beans to the crockpot.
Cook on low heat for 6 to 8 hours, or until the pork is tender.
Remove the pork from the crockpot and cut into bite-sized pieces.
Return the pork to the crockpot and keep warm until ready to serve over rice or pasta (I use egg noodles).
Garnish with chopped fresh Italian parsley and grated Parmesan cheese.
00b1995e31.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the pork ribs, onions, garlic, and spices (such as salt, pepper, and paprika).
3. Place the mixture into a crockpot, and cook on low heat for 8-10 hours or until the pork is tender and falling off the bone.
4. After the pork is cooked, remove it from the crockpot and set aside to cool.
5. In a saucepan, heat the tomato paste, red wine, and any additional seasonings (such as thyme, bay leaves, and rosemary) over medium heat.
6. Simmer the sauce for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it thickens and becomes smooth.
7. Return the cooked pork to the crockpot, and pour the sauce over the top.
8. Cover the crockpot, and cook on low heat for an additional 2-3 hours or until the pork is heated through and the sauce has thickened.
9. Serve the crockpot Braised Country Style Pork Ribs in Tomato & Red Wine Sauce over rice or mashed potatoes.

[/SYS]

14273bf5f9.gt:
Trim most of fat from pork loin, and place in crock pot, fat side up.
Sprinkle with garlic powder, pepper, salt, and red pepper flakes.
Top with onion.
Cook on high for 45-60 minutes.
Switch to low.
Cook on low for about 4 1/2 hours.
Mix all sauce ingredients together.
Separate pork loin into big chunks.
Pour sauce mixture into crock pot, making sure to mix in juices from pork loin.
Cook for one more hour, then shred pork with two forks.
Barbecue can be left simmering for another 2 hours on low, or switched to"keep warm" setting instead.
Serve on buns.
14273bf5f9.pred:
1. Preheat your crock pot on high heat.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients: 1 cup of barbecue sauce, 1/2 cup of brown sugar, 1/2 cup of ketchup, 1/4 cup of mustard, 1/4 cup of vinegar, 1/4 cup of water, 1/4 cup of honey, 1/4 cup of spicy sauce, and 1/4 cup of oil.
3. Add the following ingredients to the bowl: 1 pound of ground beef, 1/2 cup of chopped onions, 1/2 cup of chopped bell peppers, 1/2 cup of chopped celery, 1/2 cup of chopped carrots, 1/2 cup of chopped mushrooms, 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes, and 1/2 cup of corn.
4. Mix the ingredients together until well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into the crock pot and cook on high heat for 4-6 hours, or until the meat is tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Serve the Sweet N Spicy Crock Pot Barbecue over rice or noodles, and enjoy!

[/INST]

07f2c36b9b.gt:
Heat bacon for 30 seconds in the microwave between two pieces of paper towel to soak up excess grease
Spread honey mustard on tortilla then lay cheese on top of honey mustard, then add chicken, then add the bacon.
Spread the guacamole on top of the bacon then lay lettuce leaves on top of guacamole
Roll up and devour!
07f2c36b9b.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including chicken, bacon, avocado, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and any other desired toppings.
2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and season with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
4. Cook the chicken in the oven until fully cooked through, usually around 15-20 minutes.
5. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the bacon by cooking it in a pan until crispy.
6. Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
7. While the chicken is resting, prepare the avocado by removing the pit and slicing it into small pieces.
8. Toast the bread, if desired, and spread a layer of mayonnaise on one side.
9. Assemble the wrap by spreading a layer of mayonnaise on the toasted bread, followed by the sliced chicken, bacon, avocado, Swiss cheese, and any desired toppings.
10. Roll the wrap up and enjoy your delicious chicken, bacon, avocado and Swiss wrap!

[/INST]

ce99fab83f.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
Cream together butter, sugar, egg and vanilla extract until well combined.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt to mixture.
Fold in puffed rice cereal gently so as not to break up the puffs.
Incorporate chocolate chips.
Bake for 10 15 minutes.
ce99fab83f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Rice Krispies, melted butter, and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
3. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
4. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden.
5. While the Rice Krispies are baking, prepare the chocolate chips. Melt the chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl or on the stovetop, stirring occasionally, until smooth and melted.
6. Once the Rice Krispies are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Spread the melted chocolate evenly over the cooled Rice Krispies.
8. Sprinkle the chocolate chips evenly over the chocolate layer.
9. Return the dish to the oven and bake for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the chocolate chips are melted and the chocolate is set.
10. Allow the dish to cool completely before cutting it into squares and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Chip Rice Krispie Cookie!

1db4782a47.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F
Place a paper cupcake liner in each cup (12 total) of muffin pan.
Beat cream cheese with electric mixer until fluffy.
Add sugar and vanilla, beating well.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.,.
Place one of the Oreo halves, cream side up, in each muffin cup.
Spoon cream cheese mixture over wafers filling each to about 1/4 inch from top of paper.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Cool completely.
Spoon a tablespoon of the cherry pie filling on top of each tart.
Chill before serving.
1db4782a47.pred:
1. Preparation:
- Prepare a 9-inch springform pan by greasing the bottom and sides with non-stick cooking spray or butter.
- In a large bowl, mix the crushed graham crackers, melted butter, and sugar until well combined. Press the mixture evenly into the bottom of the prepared pan.
- Chill the crust in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.

2. Filling:
- In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Add the sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract, and continue to beat until well combined.
- Pour the filling over the chilled crust.
- Bake the cheesecake in a preheated oven at 325°F (163°C) for about 45-50 minutes, or until the center is set.

3. Cooling and Chilling:
- Remove the cheesecake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for about 10-15 minutes.
- Transfer the cheesecake to a wire rack and let it cool completely.
- Refrigerate the cheesecake for at least 4 hours or overnight before serving.

4. Garnishing:
- Once the cheesecake is fully chilled, use a spatula to gently remove it from the pan. Place it on a serving plate.
- Decorate the cheesecake with whipped cream, chocolate shavings, or a dusting of powdered sugar, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Black Forest Cheesecake Tarts!

c5ede2d8c3.gt:
Smooth the asparagus stalks with a peeler.
Cut in half lengthwise, then slice into 4-5 cm lengths.
Put the asparagus, salt and sesame oil into a heatproof dish and mix gently.
Microwave unwrapped at 600 W for 2 minutes.
Add more salt and sesame oil if necessary, and sprinkle on some white sesame seeds to finish.
c5ede2d8c3.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- Asparagus
- Namul (Korean salad ingredients)
- Microwave-safe bowl
- Microwave

2. Wash the asparagus thoroughly and trim the ends.
3. Cut the asparagus into bite-sized pieces.
4. In a microwave-safe bowl, combine the asparagus pieces with the Namul ingredients.
5. Add a small amount of water to the bowl, just enough to cover the ingredients.
6. Microwave the mixture on high for 2-3 minutes, or until the asparagus is tender and the Namul ingredients are heated through.
7. Serve the dish immediately, and enjoy!

Please note that the cooking time may vary depending on the specific ingredients and the microwave's power. Adjust the cooking time accordingly to achieve the desired result.

15565646e5.gt:
Sift all the ingredients together.
Wrap the lid with a kitchen towel, and start boiling water in the steamer.
Cut up the cranberries into small pieces.
In a bowl whisk the egg yolk, and add the vegetable oil, milk, sugar and strawberry sauce, in that order, and mix each time you add an ingredient.
Add the sifted dry ingredients to the bowl.
Add the cranberries and fold into the batter with a spatula.
The batter should be somewhat sticky and thick.
Place cupcake linings into silicone muffin molds and spoon in the batter 70% full.
Align the molds in the steamer and steam for 12 minutes over high heat, and the buns are done.
If you're not going to eat the buns right away, place them in a plastic bag while they are still slightly warm.
This is to prevent them from hardening.

3. Cover the dough with a clean cloth and let it rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 1-2 hours.
4. Preheat your steamer or a large pot with water.
5. Punch down the dough and transfer it to a lightly floured surface.
6. Divide the dough into 12 equal portions.
7. Roll each portion of dough into a smooth ball, then flatten it slightly.
8. Place the flattened dough balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
9. Brush the tops of the dough balls with a little bit of water.
10. Cover the baking sheet with a clean cloth and let the dough rise in a warm place until it has doubled in size, about 30-60 minutes.
11. Meanwhile, prepare the strawberries. Wash and hull the strawberries, then slice them into thin pieces.
12. When the dough has risen, carefully transfer the dough balls to the steamer or large pot of boiling water.
13. Steam the dough balls for about 15-20 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the bottoms are golden brown.
14. Carefully remove the dough balls from the steamer or pot using a slotted spoon or tongs.
15. Transfer the dough balls to a wire rack to cool for a few minutes.
16. While the dough balls are cooling, prepare the strawberry sauce. Combine the sliced strawberries, sugar, and a splash of water in a saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the strawberries are soft and the sauce has thickened slightly.
17. Once the dough balls are cool enough to handle, carefully cut a small hole in the center of each one.

9b2eec25f7.gt:
Wash the cabbage well, remove the core, and chop roughly.
Try to use very fresh, raw beef offal!
Blanch the beef offal by dipping it in boiling water and then putting it in ice water.
Cut the Chinese chives into 5 cm pieces.
Remove the center of the garlic and slice the cloves.
Cut the grilled tofu into 12 equal pieces.
Remove the seeds from the red chili pepper.
Add all ingredients except for the Chinese chives and sesame oil.
Simmer and skim off scum.
If using chicken stock, add 1.5 tablespoons now.
When the cabbage is cooked, add the Chinese chives and the sesame oil.
Cutting the red chili pepper into very fine pieces will increase the spiciness.
As soon as the Chinese chives are heated, sprinkle on the sesame seeds and it's all done!
Eat with the soup and enjoy!
Make ramen for the "shime" at the end of the meal.
Cook fresh noodles in boiling water for 1 minute and then add to the hot pot soup.
Simmer for 3 minutes and the noodles are done.
Refer tofor the chicken stock.
9b2eec25f7.pred:

- Sliced carrots

- Salt

- Cooking oil

- Clean and chop the motsu into bite-sized pieces.
- Clean and chop the onions and carrots into similar-sized pieces.
- Clean and chop the cabbage into similar-sized pieces.
- Cook the rice according to the package instructions.

3. Prepare the hot pot:
- Fill the hot pot with water, leaving enough space for the ingredients.
- Heat the cooking oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
- Add the sliced onions and carrots to the skillet, stirring occasionally, until they are softened and slightly browned.
- Add the sliced cabbage to the skillet, stirring occasionally, until it is softened and slightly browned.
- Add the rice to the skillet, stirring to combine with the vegetables.
- Add the soy sauce and stir to combine.

- Bring the hot pot to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 10-15 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the vegetables are tender.

- Serve the Hakata Specialty Soy Sauce Based Motsu Hot Pot immediately.

f545630e3c.gt:
Combine cracker crumbs and taco seasoning, stirring well.
Roll chicken in cracker crumbs and place in a greased 13x9 baking dish.
Saute green onions in butter in a skillet until tender.
Stir in whipping cream and remaining ingredients.
Pour over chicken.
Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 45 minutes.

Soften butter, add sugar and eggs, stir till creamy.
Sift flour, baking powder and salt.
Fold dry ingredients into creamy mixture.
Blend in almonds, raisins, lemon.

4ecdf46b58.gt:
Heat frying pan and fry bacon until lightly browned
Spoon baked beans onto base of muffin halves, top with cooked bacon and squirt tomato sauce on bacon if you wish and top each muffin with cheese
Place muffins under grill and cook for a few minutes until cheese has melted

0af8036e1e.gt:
Grease an 11 x 7-inch-inch baking pan.
Set oven to 350 degrees F.
In a large bowl, beat 1 cup sugar and the shortening with an electric mixer on medium or high speed until well mixed.
Add in eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition, then add in orange extract.
In a small bowl mix together flour, baking soda and salt.
Add flour mixture and buttermilk alternately to egg mixture, beating on low speed after each addition JUST until combined.
By hand stir in the orange peel, raisins and nuts.
Transfer and spread the batter into prepared baking pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.
Stir together 1/3 cup sugar and the orange juice; gradually pour over the baked cake.
Cool in pan on a wire rack for 30 minutes.
Serve warm, or cool completely.
0af8036e1e.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including flour, sugar, baking powder, eggs, milk, and butter.
2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
4. Add the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
5. Gradually add the milk and melted butter, mixing until smooth.
6. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
7. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
8. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.
9. Once the cake is fully cooled, use a serrated knife to cut it into slices.
10. Enjoy your delicious Orange Snack Cake!

cf03193597.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F Lightly grease two baking sheets or cover them with parchment paper.
In a medium-sized bowl, mix well oats, coconut, flour, and sugar.
Mix in butter and honey.
In a small bowl, mix boiling water and baking soda together and add to the flour mixture.
Drop rounded teaspoonfuls of dough 3 inches apart onto prepared baking sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes, until crisp and golden brown.
Cool on the baking sheet for 30 seconds.
Loosen with a thin spatula and cool on wire racks.
If the cookies stick to the sheet, return to the oven for 1 minute, then loosen with a spatula.
When cool, store in an airtight container.

d6c22c19dd.gt:
Cut your brownies up into square bite size pieces and put a single layer of the brownies in the container you want to use.
It can be single serving or in a big truffle dish.
Whip your cream to stiff peaks and then fold in powder sugar.
Making sure it's combined.
Spoon or put in the whipped cream in pastry bag and put the whipped cream top of the brownies.
Then, drizzle the caramel on top and drizzle the chocolate fudge in a pastry bag or zip lock bag and cutting a end on it and top the brownie sundae with cherry.
Enjoy.

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: brownies, ice cream, whipped cream, chocolate sauce, and a sundae dish.
2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. Prepare the brownies by following the recipe or using store-bought brownies.
4. Allow the brownies to cool completely.
5. Once the brownies are cooled, cut them into small pieces.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the ice cream with a small amount of whipped cream to make a creamy consistency.

0524637e4d.gt:
Don't peel the potatoes.
Just wash if needed.
Then cut in to medium dice.
Put in pan with enough water to cover.
Add the amount of salt for your taste.
Bring to the boil.
Cook until tender, but not mushy.
Cool a little.
While the potatoes are cooking mix all the other ingredients for the dressing together in a bowl or jug.
You may want to add more or less milk to the dressing, depending how thick or thin you want to coat the potatoes.
0524637e4d.pred:

1. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into bite-sized pieces.
2. In a large bowl, mix the potatoes with olive oil, salt, pepper, and a pinch of paprika.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the honey mustard dressing by combining honey, mustard, mayonnaise, vinegar, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

84cd401629.gt:
Roast the poblano peppers direct in the stove until the skin turns black, be careful not to burn the pepper.
Put the roast poblano peppers into a plastic bag and top with a cloth, wait 10 minutes.
Put oil on your hands and peel the poblano peppers.
With a thin knife carefully opened vertically and cut the base of the seeds, remove seeds and wash if necessary.
Fill poblano peppers with cheese.
Heat the oil in an 1 inch pan and stir the garlic, add the rice, stir for 2 minutes until rices start move and stick together, add 1 1/2 cup of water, put the poultry seasoning and the salt move carefully.
place the poblano peppers on the pan.
Turn heat to low.
cover and let cook until water is absorbed.
Add 1 cup of water, wait until water gone and taste the rice.

2. Cut the peppers into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large pot, cook the rice according to the package instructions.

5. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are translucent.
6. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.
7. Add the cooked rice to the pan and stir to combine.
8. Add the cooked Poblano peppers and stir to combine.

Bring water to a boil.
Add the salt.
Gradually whisk in cornmeal, then reduce to low heat and cook until thick and tender (about 15 minutes).
Remove from heat and stir in the parmesan, milk, butter, herbs, and pepper.

1bcf4a39d5.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
Press pie crust into a 9-inch deep dish pie plate.
Cover the edges of the crust with aluminum foil.
Bake pie crust until lightly browned, about 12 minutes.
Set pie crust aside to cool.
Increase oven heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat until crisp, about 10 minutes.
Drain the bacon slices on paper towels, while retaining drippings in the skillet.
Stir zucchini, mushrooms, onion, and garlic into the reserved bacon drippings; season with Italian seasoning, dill, parsley, garlic salt, and black pepper.
Cook and stir the zucchini mixture until the zucchini is tender yet crisp, 5 to 7 minutes; remove from heat.

Spoon zucchini mixture over the mozzarella cheese layer.
Pour eggs over the zucchini mixture; top with remaining mozzarella cheese.

Put pie plate onto a baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven until the top begins to brown, about 30 minutes.

4. Pour the mixture into a greased pie dish, and smooth the top with a spatula.

2a17a3e2d2.gt:
In a large bowl, combine tomatoes, cucumber, green onion, yellow pepper, parsley, and basil.
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, ground black pepper, and garlic.
Pour lemon juice mixture over the tomato mixture, and toss to coat.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place bread cubes in a single layer on a baking sheet.
Bake for 12 minutes, or until toasted and dry.
Toss bread cubes with tomato mixture, and serve.

- 1 loaf of bread (preferably Italian bread)
- 1 head of lettuce (romaine or arugula)
- 1/2 cup of chopped red onion
- 1/2 cup of chopped cucumber
- 1/2 cup of chopped tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of chopped bell peppers
- 1/2 cup of chopped olives
- 1/2 cup of chopped capers
- 1/2 cup of chopped fresh basil

9168e15a37.gt:
Heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil in a heavy soup pot or Dutch oven over medium heat, and add the onions.
Cook, stirring, until very tender, about eight minutes.
Add a pinch of salt and the garlic, and stir for another minute or so until fragrant.
Stir in the tomatoes, with their liquid, and bring to a simmer.
Simmer about eight minutes until cooked down and fragrant, and add the cauliflower to the pot.
Stir together, and add the bay leaf, rosemary, pepper, dissolved tomato paste and wine.
Bring to a simmer, and add salt to taste.
Cover, reduce the heat and simmer 30 to 40 minutes until the cauliflower is very tender.
Stir in the olives and vinegar if using, and adjust salt and pepper.
Remove from the heat, and stir in the remaining olive oil.
Serve hot or warm.
9168e15a37.pred:

Cut the avocado and tuna into bite-sized chunks.

24c12168e6.gt:
Insert wooden craft sticks or lollipop sticks into the cores of the apples at the stem.
Place the roasted peanuts and candies on separate plates.
Set aside.

2. Cut the apples into slices, making sure to remove the core and seeds.
3. Dip each slice of apple into the melted chocolate, ensuring that the entire slice is covered.
4. Place the chocolate-covered apples on a plate or tray to set.

97bb525c81.gt:
Heat 6 tablespoons olive oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add onions and saute until deep golden brown, about 20 minutes; sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Transfer onions to large bowl; mix in prunes, dates, apricots, sugar, and cinnamon.
Do ahead Can be made 1 day ahead.
Cover and chill.
Preheat oven to 350F Spread fruit mixture over bottom of large roasting pan.
Tuck chicken wing tips under.
Rub each chicken with 1/2 tablespoon remaining olive oil and 1/2 teaspoon turmeric.
Sprinkle each with salt and pepper; place chickens, side by side, atop fruit mixture.
Pour 11/2 cups water around chickens.
Roast chickens 1 hour.
Turn pan around; add more water to fruit mixture by 1/4 cupfuls if beginning to dry.
Continue to roast chickens until brown and juices run clear when thigh is pierced, about 45 minutes.
Transfer chickens to carving board; let stand 10 minutes.
Spoon fruit onto platter; top with chickens and any accumulated juices.
Sprinkle with almonds and serve.
97bb525c81.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
3. Place the chicken in a roasting pan, skin side up.
4. In a small bowl, mix the dried fruit and almonds together.
5. Spread the dried fruit and almond mixture evenly over the chicken, making sure to cover the entire surface.
6. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 1-1.5 hours, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before carving and serving.

Enjoy your delicious roast chicken with dried fruit and almonds!

a5230cef43.gt:
With and Electric mixer, beat butter & Icing sugar until it stands up like egg whites.
In a seperate medium bowl, combine flour and corn starch.
Add slowly to butter and icing sugar mixture.
(I find when your mixer starts to power out, then use a wooden spoon to take over, but please try to use the mixer as long as possible).
Drop from teaspoon onto cookie sheet about 2 inches apart.
Top cookies with jub-jubs, bar cherries, or anything really.
My oldest son loves smarties on his.
Imagination is up to you.
Bake at 300 for approx 30 minutes until bottom edges turn a light brown.
(Because all ovens vary please start checking them at about 20-25 minutes).
a5230cef43.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and continue to mix until well combined.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, stirring until a smooth dough forms.
6. Roll the dough out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
7. Cut out the desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
8. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
9. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious whipped shortbread cookies!

1a8f7f2d8d.gt:
In a medium-large bowl, combine the rhubarb, strawberries, sugar and cornstarch.
Mix well.
The mixture should be thick and syrupy after being stirred well.
Roll out pie crust according to recipe or package instructions and place in a 9- or 9.5-inch pie plate.
Pour the strawberry/rhubarb mixture into the crust, using a large spoon to fill evenly.
For the topping: In a small bowl, combine the flour and brown sugar.
Cut the butter into pieces and using a pastry cutter or two knives, cut the butter into the flour/sugar mixture until it has the consistency of coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle the streusel topping evenly over the top of the pie.
Place the pie on a rimmed baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees for 50-55 minutes, covering the pie crust edges with foil halfway through in order to prevent over-browning.
Let the pie cool completely before cutting into pieces.
Serve with a dollop of freshly whipped cream, if desired.

d4da80f96c.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine 3/4 cup sugar, flour, cocoa, baking powder, cinnamon, cloves and salt.
Stir in milk, melted butter and vanilla, beating until smooth.
Pour batter into an ungreased 9-inch squre baking pan.
Stir together remaining 1/2 cup sugar, brown sugar, remaining 1/4 cup cocoa and cinnamon.
Sprinkle this evenly over batter in baking dish.
Combine hot water and rum; pour this over top of sugar-cocoa mixture in dish; do not stir.
Bake 35 to 40 minutes at 350 degrees F until center is almost set.
Remove from oven and let stand 15 minutes.
Serve, spooning sauce from bottom of pan over top.
Delicious with vanilla ice cream or whipped cream!
d4da80f96c.pred:
To prepare the Cinn-ful Fudgy Rum Pudding Cake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 cup (200g) all-purpose flour
- 1 cup (200g) granulated sugar
- 1/2 cup (120g) unsalted butter, softened
- 1/2 cup (120g) milk
- 1/4 cup (60g) rum extract
- 1 egg
- 1/4 cup (60g) cinnamon
- 1/4 cup (60g) baking powder
- 1/4 cup (60g) salt
- 1/2 cup (120g) unsalted butter, melted
- 1/4 cup (60g) rum

3. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
5. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
6. Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Then, transfer the cake to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. Once the cake is completely cooled, you can serve it as is or add a dusting of powdered sugar, a drizzle of rum sauce, or a dollop of whipped cream, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Cinn-ful Fudgy Rum Pudding Cake!

f87ab5a162.gt:
In a large pot, heat the oil.
Add the onion and cook over moderate heat, stirring, until golden brown, 7 minutes.
Add the bacon and cook, stirring, until the fat has rendered, 10 minutes.
Add the collards and cook over moderately high heat, stirring, until it begins to wilt, 4 minutes.
Add the vinegar and boil for 1 minute.
Add the sorghum syrup, stock, water, crushed red pepper and a large pinch of salt.
Cover and cook, stirring a few times, until the collards are very tender, 1 1/2 hours.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, simmer the cream over moderate heat until reduced by one-third, 10 minutes.
Add the kimchi and remove from the heat.
When the collards are done, stir in the kimchi cream.
Season with salt and serve.
f87ab5a162.pred:
1. Start by washing the collard greens thoroughly.
2. In a large pot, heat some oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the chopped garlic and cook for a few more seconds.
5. Add the collard greens, stirring to combine with the onions and garlic.
6. Pour in the kimchi juice, and stir to combine.
7. Add the cream, and stir to combine.
8. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the collard greens are tender and the sauce has thickened.
9. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Serve the Kimchi-Creamed Collard Greens hot, over rice or with your favorite side dish.

Please note that these instructions are just a general guideline, and the actual cooking process may vary depending on individual preferences and the specific ingredients used.

bf5b8fd371.gt:
In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add in the tomatoes, capers, anchovies, olives and garlic.
Cook until fragrant and tomatoes soften.
This will take about 5 minutes.
Add in the tomato puree and season with salt and pepper.
Cook for a couple more minutes.
In the meantime in a large pot cook the spaghetti in salted water.
Cook until pasta is al dente (according to package instructions for al dente).
Reserve a cup or so of pasta water.
Drain the pasta and add it right the the sauce.
Add some of the reserved pasta water to thin out the sauce as needed.
Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve right away.
You can sprinkle some grated Parmesan cheese on top to serve.

To cook the Spaghetti Puttanesca, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 8 oz spaghetti
- 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/2 cup capers, rinsed and drained
- 1/4 cup olives, pitted
- 1/4 cup red onion, thinly sliced
- 1/4 cup garlic, minced
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1/2 tsp red pepper flakes
- Salt and pepper, to taste

2. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
3. In a large skillet or saucepan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and red onion, and cook for a few minutes until they are softened.
4. Add the cherry tomatoes, capers, olives, and red pepper flakes. Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet, and toss everything together until the spaghetti is coated with the sauce.
6. Season the dish with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the Spaghetti Puttanesca immediately, and enjoy!

399c8a1881.gt:
Preheat oven to 200 deg Celsius.
Less for fan-forced.
Line 2 trays with non-stick paper.
In a small bowl cream together butter, sugar and vanilla.
Add egg yolk & beat well.
Sift together flour, soda, salt and nutmeg.
Fold half the sour cream and half the dry ingredients into the butter mixture.
Fold in remaining halves.
Mix well to combine.
With floured hands roll teaspoonfuls of mixture into small balls and place on prepared trays.
Press lightly on top with a fork.
Bake in oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until pale golden in colour.
Cool slightly on trays before moving to wire racks to cool.
Dip tops of biscuits in the Citrus Glaze.
Citrus Glaze: Combine icing sugar, juices and orange rind in a cup.
Place cup in saucepan of hot water, beat with fork until glossy.
Pour into a saucer to make icing the biscuits easier.

To make Sour Cream Cookies, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of sour cream
- 2 cups of sugar
- 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract
- 2 eggs
- 1 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon of baking powder
- 1/2 teaspoon of salt
- 1/2 cup of unsalted butter, softened
- 1/2 cup of chopped nuts (optional)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the sour cream, vanilla extract, and flour mixture until well combined.
5. Stir in the baking powder and salt.
6. Fold in the chopped nuts, if using.
7. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Sour Cream Cookies!

2b3918d7ce.gt:
Core the peppers using the blunt edge of a potato peeler, save half the seeds removed, toss the core.
In a bowl add cream cheese, chili powder, hot sauce (you pick the heat) and liquid smoke and half the jalapeno seeds.
Mix/Mash together until blended.
Stuff the cored peppers with cream cheese mix then wrap with raw bacon.
Use your fingers!
Kabob them, repeat untill all the peppers are stuffed and wrapped.
Grill on an indirect heat, (on tin foil) for about 15 minutes.
Then on an open flame for 5-8 mins to crisp the bacon, turning a few times.
Serve and enjoy!
2b3918d7ce.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. Cut the jalapeno peppers in half lengthwise, removing the seeds and membranes.
3. Place the jalapeno halves on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
4. Lay a slice of bacon on top of each jalapeno half.
5. Bake the jalapeno poppers in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the bacon is crispy and the peppers are tender.
6. Remove the jalapeno poppers from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Bacon Wrapped Jalapeno Poppers!

f62b39d078.gt:
Preheat oven to 375*.
Lightly spray bottom of 8- or 9-inch square pan with cooking spray.
Place apples in bottom of pan.
Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly; sprinkle over apples.
Bake for 30-45 minutes.
f62b39d078.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, oats, butter, and a baking dish.
2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. Cut the apples into bite-sized pieces and toss them in a bowl with sugar, flour, and oats.
4. Melt the butter in a saucepan over low heat.
5. Add the sugar and flour to the melted butter, stirring constantly until the mixture thickens.
6. Pour the mixture over the apples in the bowl and mix well.
7. Transfer the apple mixture to the prepared baking dish and smooth out the top.
8. Bake the apple crisp in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until the crisp is golden brown and the apples are tender.
9. Remove the crisp from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Apple Crisp!

6a28e55b7e.gt:
First, grab that can of pumpkin.
I like to use Libbys, but you can use any brand you like.
Puree the pumpkin in your food processor, just to make sure that you take care of any big lumps.
We want the bisque to be nice and smooth.
Mix all the ingredients together in a sauce pan except for the evaporated milk.
Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to medium and let simmer for 6-7 minutes.
Then, reduce the heat again to low, and add in the evaporated milk.
Heat the bisque on medium heat, stirring constantly, until it gets hot.
Serve immediately.
6a28e55b7e.pred:
To make a delicious pumpkin bisque, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the pumpkin, then cut it into small pieces.
3. In a large pot, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the pumpkin pieces and cook until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
4. Add 4 cups of water to the pot, and bring the mixture to a boil.
5. Reduce the heat to low, and let the pumpkin cook for about 20-25 minutes, or until the pumpkin is completely tender.
6. Remove the pumpkin from the pot, and let it cool slightly.
7. In a blender or food processor, blend the cooked pumpkin until it is smooth and creamy.
8. Return the pumpkin mixture to the pot, and stir in 1 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of heavy cream, and 1/2 cup of pumpkin pie spice.
9. Bring the mixture to a simmer, and cook for about 10-15 minutes, or until it thickens slightly.
10. Taste the bisque, and adjust the seasoning as needed.
11. Serve the pumpkin bisque hot, garnished with a sprinkle of pumpkin pie spice, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious pumpkin bisque!

3ba549830f.gt:
Mix sauce, peppers and walnuts in saucepan; cook on medium heat until heated through, stirring occasionally.
Pour over hot ravioli in large serving bowl; toss to coat.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley, if desired.
3ba549830f.pred:
To cook the Alfredo with Roasted Red Peppers, follow these steps:

1. In a large pot, heat some oil over medium heat.
2. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3. Pour in a cup of milk and stir to combine.
4. Add a pinch of salt and pepper, and stir to combine.
5. Gradually pour in a cup of heavy cream, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
6. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low and let it cook for about 5 minutes or until it thickens slightly.
7. Add a cup of grated Parmesan cheese and stir until melted and smooth.
8. Add the roasted red peppers, and stir to combine.
9. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes or until the sauce is heated through and the red peppers are tender.

Serve the Alfredo with Roasted Red Peppers over your choice of pasta, and enjoy!

af2aa1a2fd.gt:
Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Cook sausages in hot skillet, turning regularly, until no longer pink in the center, about 10 minutes.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
Transfer to a cutting board and slice.
Heat olive oil in a separate skillet over medium heat.
Cook and stir onion, bell pepper, and garlic in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes; season with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper and cook 1 minute more.
Add sliced sausage, crushed tomatoes, and sliced zucchini; bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and continue cooking until the zucchini is tender, about 10 minutes.
af2aa1a2fd.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 1 pound of spicy Italian sausage
- 1 medium zucchini, peeled and chopped
- 1/4 cup of olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Optional: minced garlic, red pepper flakes, and grated Parmesan cheese

2. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
3. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the chopped zucchini and cook until tender, about 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Add the spicy Italian sausage to the skillet and cook until browned, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.
5. In a small bowl, mix the minced garlic, red pepper flakes, and grated Parmesan cheese.
6. Add the spice mixture to the skillet with the sausage and zucchini, stirring to combine.
7. Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the sausage is cooked through and the zucchini is tender.
8. Serve the spicy Italian sausage and zucchini over a bed of cooked pasta or rice.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Italian sausage and zucchini dish!

26c6578eb7.gt:

Preheat oven to 375 F. 2.

Spray a 9 by 13 baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.

c4c9825372.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Oil up the pan.
Chop up some lemons and onions put them in the pan.
You can add foil paper to the pan if you dont want it to stick.
If your shrimp doesnt come deveind do that and add that to the pan.
Now get some salt and pepper add a bit over the shrimp.
(garlic and parsley can be added) Now the cayenne pepper is optional i like my shrimp spicy (:
Stick the shrimp in the oven let cook.
I let cook for 20 mins took it out mixed it added more cayenne pepper squeezed some lemon juice over it then put it back in the oven for about 10 mins.
You can make some pasta and garlic bread as a good side.
While its cooking.
Now take the shrimp out :D

d44553522d.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Cook bacon in large skillet until crispy, about 5 min.
; drain.
Set bacon aside.
Add ground beef, onions and peppers to skillet; cook 5 min.
or until ground beef is browned, stirring constantly.
Stir in tomato sauce; cook 3 min.
or until heated through.
Remove from heat; stir in olives, raisins and reserved bacon.
Spoon mixture into 13x9-inch baking dish.
Combine prepared corn muffin batter and cheese in medium bowl.
Spoon evenly over meat mixture.
Bake 20 min.
or until corn muffin topping is completely baked and golden brown.
Cool slightly before serving.
Top each serving with sour cream.

e03a1d1119.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Saute squash in butter until tender, about 10 minutes.
Set aside.
In a large skillet, cook the ground beef, onion, and jalapeno, stirring until beef is evenly browned.
Drain off grease.
In a large bowl, mix together the squash, eggs, and mayonnaise.
Stir in the ground beef mixture and Cheddar cheese.
Season with salt and pepper.
Pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish, and sprinkle cracker crumbs evenly over the top.
Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until heated through, and the top is nicely browned.
e03a1d1119.pred:
To cook the spicy squash casserole, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of squash (any type)
- 1 cup of cooked rice

d7f3a33c04.gt:
Heat olive oil in a cast iron pot.
Add onion and saute for 34 minutes until tender.
Add garlic and saute for an additional minute.
Take the onion and garlic out of the pot and set aside.
Add sausage to pan and brown.
(You do not have to add more oil.
The sausage tends to render a lot of grease when it is cooked.)
Drain excess grease and add the onion and garlic back to the pot.
Add broth, tomatoes and bay leaf.
Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes.
Add gnocchi and cook until it floats to the top, 23 minutes.
Stir in spinach and kale and cook for an additional 12 minutes, until the greens are wilted.
Season soup to taste with salt, pepper, crushed red pepper flakes and Italian seasoning.
Serve immediately.

- Stir to combine and let the flavors meld for a few minutes.
- Serve the gnocchi soup hot, garnished with additional parsley if desired.

3. Tips and Variations:

- If you prefer a lighter version, you can use vegetable broth instead of chicken broth.
- For a creamier texture, you can add a small amount of milk or cream instead of the heavy cream.

5410800131.gt:
Fit a large steamer rack inside a large wide pot.
Add enough water to reach within 1/2 inch of bottom of rack.
Bring to a boil.
Pat chicken dry and put, skin side up, in a shallow bowl (that will fit on steamer rack inside pot).
Sprinkle with ginger and steam, covered, over high heat, until chicken is just cooked through, 30 to 35 minutes (replenish water if necessary).
Carefully remove bowl with chicken.
Pour off juices into a glass measure and set aside 1/4 cup (reserve remainder for another use).
Return chicken in bowl to pot and keep warm, covered, off heat.
Heat a wok or large heavy skillet (not nonstick) over high heat until smoking, then drizzle oil down side of wok and swirl to coat.
Reduce heat to medium, then add garlic and stir-fry 15 seconds.
Add chiles and stir-fry 15 seconds.
Add cilantro and stir-fry 1 minute.
Stir in remaining ingredients, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 cup chicken juices and simmer 1 minute.
Transfer to a bowl.
Drizzle some sauce over chicken (include some solids for a spicier sauce); serve the rest on the side.
Season chicken with salt.

0d43f262d2.gt:
Heat oil in a large pot.
Saute the onion until it starts to brown a little.
Add the chicken and cook each piece so it's browned on both sides.
Add potatoes and carrots.
Cook for a few minutes while stirring.
Add the tomatoes and cook for another few minutes while stirring.
Cover the pot and continue to cook on medium for 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add in the garlic and all the spices.
Mix well with other ingredients.
Add the zucchini, tomato paste, and a little salt and mix in.
Pour in enough water to just cover everything.
Bring to a boil, turn to low and let simmer for 45-50 minutes until every thing is well cooked and the stew has thickened.
Just before serving, stir in the chopped coriander.
Enjoy with basmati rice or bread :)
0d43f262d2.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
3. Add the chicken, season with salt, pepper, and your desired spices. Cook the chicken until it is fully cooked through, then remove it from the pot and set aside.
4. In the same pot, add the vegetables (such as carrots, celery, and bell peppers) and cook until they are tender.
5. Pour in the chicken broth and bring the mixture to a boil.
6. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let the stew simmer for about 30 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
7. Return the cooked chicken to the pot, and let it simmer for an additional 10-15 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked through.
8. Serve the stew hot, garnished with fresh herbs, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Spiced Chicken and Vegetable Stew!

d7fcbdcf2c.gt:
Preheat oven to 350.
Cream Crisco with both types of sugar.
To this mixture, add eggs (unbeaten), water, vanilla, flour, salt and soda.
Combine.
In another bowl, mix together oatmeal, nuts and chocolate chips.
Add to original mixture.
This dough will be very full, I prefer to mix it at this point with my hands.
Put teaspoonfuls of dough on a cookie sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.
My children called their great grandmother (my grandmother) GeeGee.
She died last summer from cancer, so these cookies are very sentimental to us.
They are, the best chocolate chip cookies ever.
Hands down.
Thanks GeeGee!
We love you and miss you!
d7fcbdcf2c.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and vanilla extract until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
5. Fold in the chocolate chips.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden and the centers are set.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious GeeGees Chocolate Chip Cookies!

77787fe98c.gt:
Grind the toasted sesame seeds with a mortar and pestle.
In a bowl, combine all ingredients well.
Store in a tightly capped jar in the refrigerator.
77787fe98c.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: Za'atar, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
2. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
3. In a small bowl, mix 1 tablespoon of olive oil, 1/4 cup of lemon juice, 1/4 cup of water, 1/4 cup of Za'atar, 1/4 teaspoon of salt, and 1/4 teaspoon of pepper.
4. Spread the mixture on the chicken pieces, making sure to coat them evenly.
5. Place the chicken pieces on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until it is cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into pieces.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy meal!

b2af7945d0.gt:
Preheat the oven to 180C.
Put a piece of baking parchment paper on a baking tray.
Spread the pecans out on the baking sheet and pour the maple syrup all over
Cook them for 7 minutes (time it...or hope your sense of smell is good enough to detect when they're done!)
Remove pecans from the oven and set aside.
Combine the buttermilk and mayonnaise in a bowl or jug.
Put the cabbage, carrot and red onion (drained and dried on kitchen paper) in a large mixing bowl.
Season with white pepper.
Serve portions either with or without a few pecans, roughly broken, on top.
b2af7945d0.pred:
1. Wash the cabbage thoroughly and remove any damaged or wilted leaves.
2. Cut the cabbage into bite-sized pieces.
3. In a large bowl, combine the cabbage, grated carrots, and chopped pecans.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, maple syrup, vinegar, and sugar.
5. Pour the dressing over the cabbage mixture and toss to coat evenly.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.

Please note that these steps are just an example, and the actual recipe may vary depending on the specific ingredients and instructions provided in the photo.

acc83d0fdd.gt:
In a medium saucepan, combine half of the strawberries with the sugar and 1/3 cup of water and bring to a simmer.
Cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until the sugar is dissolved and the liquid is slightly thickened, about 5 minutes.
Transfer the strawberry mixture to a food processor.
Add the remaining strawberries and puree until smooth.
Strain the puree through a fine sieve set over a large bowl.
Add the Champagne and lemon juice and mix well.
Pour the mixture into a 9-by-13-inch glass or stainless steel baking dish.
Freeze the granita for 2 hours.
Scrape the frozen edges into the center.
Freeze for another 3 hours, scraping hourly, until the granita is icy and flaky.
Freeze for 8 hours or overnight.
Scrape the granita into bowls and serve.
acc83d0fdd.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: strawberries, sugar, water, and champagne.
2. Wash and hull the strawberries, and cut them into small pieces.
3. In a large bowl, combine the strawberries, sugar, and water.
4. Cover the bowl and refrigerate the mixture for at least 2 hours or overnight.
5. After the mixture has chilled, remove it from the refrigerator and stir it well.
6. Pour the mixture into a shallow pan or individual ramekins, and place them in the freezer.
7. Allow the granita to freeze for at least 2 hours or until it reaches your desired consistency.
8. Remove the granita from the freezer, and using a fork or a spoon, scrape the mixture to create a granular texture.
9. Serve the granita immediately, or transfer it to a platter and let it sit at room temperature for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Strawberry-Champagne Granita!

5baa4c01a1.gt:
Mix coffee and syrups together in a mug.
Fill with steamed milk.
Add a bit of foamed milk on top.
5baa4c01a1.pred:
To recreate the Milky Way Cappuccino, follow these steps:
1. Start by making a strong espresso shot using a high-quality espresso machine.
2. Next, combine the espresso with a small amount of milk, creating a layered effect.
3. Pour the milk into the espresso, creating a smooth, creamy texture.
4. Optionally, add a small amount of foam on top for extra texture and flavor.
5. Stir the mixture gently to combine the ingredients evenly.
6. Pour the Milky Way Cappuccino into a cup and enjoy!

Remember to use high-quality ingredients and follow proper brewing techniques to ensure the best possible result.

c3da9b5a1f.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
In a bowl combine corn flakes, sugar, margarine, and corn syrup.
Press mixture evenly and firmly in bottom of 12-inch pan.
Bake for 5 minutes, cool completely.
Combine cream cheese and marshmallow creme, spread over crust.
Arrange fruit over cream cheese mixture.
Chill for 1 hour.
Cut into slices.
c3da9b5a1f.pred:
1. Preparation:
- Gather the necessary ingredients: Corn Flakes, fresh fruit, pizza dough, and any additional toppings you may desire.
- Prepare the Corn Flakes by crushing them into a fine powder.
- Wash and cut the fresh fruit into small pieces.
- Preheat the oven to a suitable temperature for baking the pizza.

2. Assemble the pizza:
- Spread a layer of Corn Flakes evenly over the pizza dough.
- Add a layer of fresh fruit on top of the Corn Flakes.
- Add any additional toppings you desire, such as cheese, nuts, or seeds.
- Place the pizza in the preheated oven and bake for approximately 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the fruit is cooked through.

3. Serving:
- Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
- Cut the pizza into slices and serve it immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Corn Flakes Fruit Pizza!

19f9c7d91d.gt:
Note for quick method of cooking sweet potatoes -- I put the sweet potatoes in a baking dish and add 1/4 cup of water.
Put a lid on and microwave for approximately 20 minutes.
After they have cooled, peel and mash.
Mix all 8 ingredients for sweet potato mixture.
Pour into a greased casserole dish.
Bake in a 350 degree oven for 35 minutes and see below for crunchy topping.
Mix all 4 ingredients for topping and sprinkle over potatoes.
Bake for an additional 8 minutes and remove from oven.
Enjoy!
19f9c7d91d.pred:
To cook the Southern Sweet Potato Casserole, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Wash and peel the sweet potatoes and cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sweet potatoes, eggs, milk, sugar, and spices (such as cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice). Mix well.
4. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 45-55 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
6. Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Southern Sweet Potato Casserole!

52ceec4747.gt:
Combine all ingredients except tomatoes, in mixing bowl and whisk till combined.
Place tomatoes in zip top bag.
Pour mixture over tomatoes.
Seal and refrigerate for 6 hours.
Lay lettuce on serving platter.
Drain tomatoes and reserve marinade.
Place tomatoes on lettuce and serve marinade on the side for dipping.

419586e535.gt:
BASE: Stir together oats, flour, brown sugar, soda, salt, and melted butter.
Pat into a 11x7x1 1/2 baking dish.
Bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes.
Cool.
SECOND LAYER: Mix sugar, butter and melted chocolate.
Add egg: beat well.
Stir together flour, baking powder, and salt.
Add to chocolate mixture alternately with milk and vanilla.
Stir in chopped nuts if using.
Spread over baked cooled base layer.
Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes.
Cool.
FROSTING: Melt chocolate with butter over low heat, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat and stir in powdered sugar and vanilla.
Blend in hot water to make an almost pourable consistency.
Frost brownies.
Cut into 16 bars.
419586e535.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients: 1 cup of all-purpose flour, 1 cup of granulated sugar, 1/2 cup of unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 cup of unsalted butter, 1/2 cup of milk, and 1 egg.
3. Mix the ingredients until they are well combined and smooth.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9x13 inch baking dish.
5. Bake the brownies in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the brownies to cool completely before cutting them into tri-level squares.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Tri-Level Brownies!

03e7833d34.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees F.
Heat oil in medium skillet on medium heat.
Add ham, peppers and onions; cook 5 to 7 min.
or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Remove from heat.
Stir in salsa.
Beat eggs and sour cream with whisk until blended.
Arrange 6 tortilla halves on bottom of 13x9-inch baking dish sprayed with cooking spray.
Spread half the vegetable mixture over tortillas; cover with half of the egg mixture and 1/2 cup cheese.
Repeat all layers starting with tortillas.
Top with remaining tortillas.
Let stand 5 min.
Bake 25 min.
Top with remaining cheese; bake 5 min.
or until melted.
03e7833d34.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Prepare the ingredients: chop the vegetables (such as bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms), and grate the cheese.
3. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chopped vegetables and cook until they are tender.
4. Add the grated cheese to the skillet and stir until melted and combined.
5. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk.
6. Pour the egg and milk mixture over the vegetable and cheese mixture in the skillet. Stir to combine.
7. Pour the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
8. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
9. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before cutting it into squares and serving.

Please note that these steps are based on a general recipe and may vary depending on the specific ingredients used in the dish displayed in the photo.

586af1303f.gt:
In mixer, beat cream cheese and powdered sugar until smooth.
Add the peanut butter, milk and 3 tablespoons peanuts.
Beat until smooth.
Fold in 2 cups of Cool whip.
Spoon filling into graham cracker crust.
Refrigerate for 1 hour or until set.
Top with remaining Cool Whip.
(You can either put Cool Whip on as a top layer, or you can individually serve the Cool Whip as a large dollop on each piece of pie.
).
To serve, place piece of pie on plate and drizzle with some chocolate syrup and then some caramel syrup.
Sprinkle with chopped roasted peanuts.
You can also serve with some powdered sugar, chocolate curls and mint sprigs.
586af1303f.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the sugar, flour, and butter until well combined.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. Stir in the vanilla extract.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23cm) pie dish.
6. Bake the pie for 35-40 minutes, or until the filling is set and the crust is golden brown.
7. Allow the pie to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Please note that these steps are based on the image provided, and the actual cooking process may vary depending on the specific recipe or ingredients used.

f44011121d.gt:
In a large enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the oil until shimmering.
Add the onion, garlic, ginger and chiles and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the curry powder and turmeric and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the broth and coconut milk and season with salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the potatoes and cook over moderate heat until barely tender, 5 minutes.
Add the cauliflower and squash, cover partially and cook over moderately low heat, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 15 minutes.
Add the chicken to the casserole, season with salt and pepper and cook just until white throughout, about 5 minutes.
Serve over rice, with lemon wedges.

e6bbcbeb0b.gt:
Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
Pat potatoes dry with paper towels.
Toss potatoes and mushrooms with 21/2 tbs oil, 2 tbs cheese, 2 tsp garlic and 2 tsp rosemary, 1/2 tsp salt and 1/4 tsp pepper.
Arrange in 13x9 baking dish in one layer.
Top with remaining 2tbs cheese and bake 15 minute or until potatoes are just lightly browned.
Meanwhile, heat remaining 11/2 tbs oil in large nonstick skillet over med.
heat.
Add chicken pieces.
Season lightly with S&P, sprinkle with remaining rosemary and garlic.
Cook 5-6 minutes on each side or until browned.
(don't crowd pan, may need to do more than one batch).
Arrange chicken pieces on top of potatoes.
Drizzle with any oil from skillet and return to oven.
Bake 20-25 minute longer or until chicken is done.
e6bbcbeb0b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
3. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Form the chicken mixture into small meatballs and place them in the skillet. Cook until the meatballs are golden brown, flipping them occasionally.
4. Remove the meatballs from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet.
5. Bake the meatballs in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until cooked through.
6. Serve the Tuscany Chicken with your favorite side dish and enjoy!

ae1b5ff73e.gt:
FOR SALSA: Place all the ingrediens in medium bowl and stir gently to combine.
Cover and set aside.
FOR SWEETCORN CAKES: Combine 2 cups of the corn, onion, eggs, cilantro, flour, baking powder, salt and pepper in a food processor.
Process until well mixed.
Add the remaining 1/2 cup corn into the mixture and mix well.
Heat a large skillet at medium heat and brush with oil.
Spoon 2 heaping tablespoons of the mixture for each corn cake onto griddle.
Cook each side for 1 to 2 minutes.
Cook in batches.
Keep the cooked corn cakes warm in a 200F preheated oven.
Serve with salsa.
Makes 15 cakes.
ae1b5ff73e.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, you will need the following ingredients:
1. Cornmeal
2. All-purpose flour
3. Baking powder
4. Salt
5. Vegetable oil
6. Avocado
7. Lime juice
8. Fresh cilantro

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, all-purpose flour, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the vegetable oil, lime juice, and fresh cilantro.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until the batter is smooth and well combined.
5. Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat.
6. Pour the batter onto the skillet or griddle, using a spoon or ladle, and cook until the cakes are golden brown on both sides.
7. Serve the corn cakes with avocado salsa on the side.

To make the avocado salsa, simply mash the avocado and mix it with lime juice, salt, and cilantro. The salsa can be served on the side for dipping or spreading on the corn cakes. Enjoy your delicious corn cakes with avocado salsa!

56bc2da383.gt:
Finely slice the leek, and mix with the ingredients.
Heat the sesame oil in a frying pan, and stir-fry the leek over high heat until it's wilted.
Add the combined flavoring ingredients and stir fry over low heat, being careful not to let it burn.
Add the bonito flakes, grated garlic and mix together.
Turn off the heat and add the ra-yu chili oil, and it's done!
(You may want to grind up the bonito flakes into a powder with your fingers while it's still in the packet.)
It goes so well with piping hot freshly cooked rice.
I can't stop eating!
It goes well with simmered daikon radish or pan-fried and steam-cooked daikon radish "steak" too.
It also goes well with pan fried tofu, boiled tofu, cold tofu, atsuage, dengaku (konnyaku with miso), and so many things.
It's also great as a dip for raw vegetables, and matches well with warm cooked vegetables too.
Please try this out in whatever combinations you can come up with.
Roll into tiny balls and freeze, to use as a filling for rice balls right away!
A Cookpad user called Yoshi-chan gave me this great idea!
If you don't have the green parts of the leeks, it's also delicious made with the white parts.
You may want to chop up and freeze the green parts and make this miso when you have enough.
56bc2da383.pred:

4. In a small saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat.
5. Add the green leeks and cook until they are tender and slightly wilted.
6. Pour the miso paste mixture into the saucepan and stir to combine.
7. Cook the sauce for a few minutes, stirring occasionally, until it reaches your desired consistency.
8. Serve the All-purpose Green Leek and Miso Sauce over rice or noodles.

Enjoy your delicious All-purpose Green Leek and Miso Sauce!

534e9101f4.gt:

Cream together first five ingredients (will be soupy looking).
In separate bowl mix with whisk next 3 ingredients then add to wet batter (this will be rather thick).
Fold in blueberries carefully.
Spread into greased 9x13-inch pan.
Mix topping ingredients in a bowl and crumble with pastry blender or 2 knives until mealy.
Top batter with topping and bake for 35-40 minutes.

feb321aa71.gt:
Rinse lobster shells and body parts with cold water to clean.
Add lobster parts to stock pot.
Add water to cover.
Add lemon juice and garlic salt.
Bring pot to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Use tongs to remove and discard lobster shells and body pieces.
Add vegetables and simmer another 30 minutes.
Use slotted spoon to remove vegetables.
Reserve and serve with cooked rice.
Line a collander with cheescloth and ladel stock to strain through cheescloth into a pot.
Discard solids.
Lobster stock can be refrigerated for 10 days or frozen for 6 months.
Use in sauces, dips, soups and stews.
