e8b69ecf30.gt:
Combine flour, salt and ricotta; mix thoroughly.
Knead dough on lightly floured board until dough is smooth.
Set dough aside on corned of floured board.
Cut small pieces from dough and quickly roll dough into a "finger thin" roll, and cut into pieces about 1/2 inch long.
Flatten each piece gently with thumb and bring long sides together to form a hollow tube or shell shape.
Arrange the gnocchi on a lightly floured cloth or board, dust them lightly with flour.
After shaping all the dough, gently drop the gnocchi into a large pot of boiling, salted water.
Cook them about 10-12 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
When they rise to the surface, remove them from the pot with a strainer.
Place in a heated bowl.
Serve with your favorite pasta sauce and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
e8b69ecf30.pred:
1. In a large pot, bring 4 cups of water to a boil.
2. Add 1 cup of all-purpose flour and stir until smooth.
3. Gradually add 1 cup of ricotta cheese, stirring constantly to avoid lumps.
4. Continue stirring until the mixture thickens and forms a dough.
5. Remove the pot from the heat and let the dough cool for a few minutes.
6. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
7. On a floured surface, roll out the dough into small balls, about the size of a walnut.
8. Place the balls on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
9. Bake the gnocchi for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
10. Remove the gnocchi from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

ffd5e1942a.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 F. Spray an 8x8 baking pan with cooking spray and set aside.
In a large bowl, cream together cream cheese and butter until light and fluffy with a electric hand mixer.
Add in egg and cake mix and beat until combined.
Fold in white chocolate chips and sprinkles.
Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake for 30 minutes, or until bars turn golden brown.
Remove from oven and let them cool completely.
Cut into bars and serve.
Enjoy!
Note: Funfetti cake batter bars will keep covered for about five days.
ffd5e1942a.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Grease a 9x13 inch baking dish or a similar-sized pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cake mix, eggs, oil, and water. Mix until well combined.
4. Spread the mixture evenly into the prepared baking dish.
5. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bars comes out clean.
6. Allow the bars to cool completely before cutting them into bars.
7. Enjoy your delicious Funfetti Cake Batter Bars!

83dee537f7.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix all of the ingredients (except the tomato sauce) together and form into (2) loaves.
Place loaves onto a lightly greased foil lined and rimmed cookie sheet.
Bake for 45 minutes, then pour one can tomato sauce over each loaf.
Return to oven to bake for another 15 minutes.
Let set 10 minutes before serving.

feb5ca6df3.gt:
Brown sausage in a medium skillet over medium high heat, stirring to break apart.
Drain, and place in a bowl.
Stir in softened cream cheese, drained sauerkraut, and mustard until thoroughly combined.
Cover, and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Place beaten eggs and crushed crackers in separate bowls.
Roll sausage mixture into small balls and dip first into egg, then roll in cracker crumbs to coat.
Arrange on a sheet pan.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes, turning once for even browning.
Serve warm.

16b48ecd6b.gt:
All the ingredients in brackets can be added according to your own taste.
Peel and slice the potatoes and cook them for about 10 or 15 minutes in a microwave.
Fry the chopped onion with garlic (and chopped chilli).
Add the beef chunks (bacon bits) to the already fried mixture.
Cook the meat.
Add the sliced peppers (mushrooms).
When the meat is cooked add the potatoes and toss everything together until everything is heated through.
If the meat looks like it's drying add a little bit of wine (or water with a dash of vinegar if you don't want to or can't use alcohol).

53797b9666.gt:
Mix together the egg, milk, and sugar in a deep bowl or tupperware container.
If you mix up the egg whites to break them up thoroughly, and it'll turn out better.
Cut the frozen bread into 4 pieces.
Use a skewer to poke holes into it.
It's hard for the egg mixture to get absorbed near the crusts, so be sure to poke holes there!
Soak the bread in the egg mixture.
After about two minutes, flip the bread over.
The bread is soft, so if you're worried about breaking it, use a spatula to flip.
Once both sides have completely soaked, fry it up and enjoy!
This is a version made without cutting up the bread.
It might look a bit unappealing with all those holes, but you won't be able to tell at all after it's been fried!
If it's too soft, it can break, but you can use a spatula to safely flip it over.
You can make more french toast with the remaining egg mixture if you like, but I like to pour it over the bread to fill in the holes!
!
53797b9666.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, sugar, salt, and vanilla extract.
3. Add the bread cubes to the mixture and stir until the bread is evenly coated.
4. Pour the batter into a greased baking dish or a well-greased skillet.
5. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.
6. Allow the bread to cool for a few minutes before cutting it into slices.
7. Serve the fluffy French toast warm, with your favorite toppings, such as syrup, butter, or fruit.

[/SYS]

a896ff3f80.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir shallot until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Pour balsamic vinegar into skillet and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low and simmer until balsamic vinegar mixture is reduced by half, about 10 minutes.
Stir often.
Cut chicken breasts from one side through the middle horizontally to within one-half inch of the other side.
Open the two sides and spread them out like an open book.
Spread half the goat cheese onto one half of each chicken breast and drizzle 1/3 of the reduced balsamic vinegar mixture over the goat cheese.
Close the chicken breasts over the goat cheese and secure with toothpicks.
Arrange chicken into a baking dish.
Drizzle with remaining 1/3 of the balsamic reduction.
Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink inside, the filling is hot, and the juices run clear, 30 to 35 minutes.
An instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the center of a filled breast should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
a896ff3f80.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
3. In a small bowl, mix together the goat cheese, bread crumbs, and a drizzle of olive oil.
4. Stuff each chicken breast with the goat cheese mixture.
5. Place the stuffed chicken breasts on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the chicken breasts in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken breasts from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/SYS]

77ef934d1a.gt:
Process cranberries in blender or food processor; pour sugar over cranberries and stir to dissolve.
Bring 3/4 cup of water to a boil; stir in gelatin and let cool.
Stir cooled gelatin into cranberries, and add pineapple, orange juice, apple and pecans.
Mix well, cover and refrigerate overnight.
Whip cream and beat in cream cheese.
In a glass serving dish, layer half of the cranberry mixture, then the whipped cream mixture, then the remaining cranberry mixture.
77ef934d1a.pred:
To cook the Creamy Cranberry Salad, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: cranberries, cream, sugar, and any other desired ingredients such as nuts or dried fruits.

2. Wash and drain the cranberries.

3. In a large bowl, mix the cranberries with sugar and cream until the cranberries are coated evenly.

4. Add any desired nuts or dried fruits to the mixture.

5. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or overnight.

6. Serve the Creamy Cranberry Salad chilled or at room temperature.

This dish is a delicious and refreshing side dish or appetizer that combines the tangy sweetness of cranberries with the creamy richness of the cream. The combination of ingredients creates a delightful and visually appealing dish that is perfect for any gathering or meal.

dc27b2826e.gt:
Mix cream cheese and sugar well with mixer.
Add vanilla and Cool Whip; mix well.
MUST be refrigerated, except when serving.
Ices 1 triple layer cake or 2 other cakes.
When using on layers just ice top of layers and let icing ooze over sides.
It's easy and attractive to take somewhere.
Hi Tankers, Thanks so much for your honest review, what went wrong for you on making this?
A comment about what didn't work would help.
Maybe this recipe needs some tweaking.
Thanks,.
Teresa M.
dc27b2826e.pred:
To recreate the cream cheese icing, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 1 cup of softened cream cheese
- 1/2 cup of powdered sugar
- 1/2 cup of milk
- 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla extract
- 1/4 teaspoon of salt

2. Combine the ingredients:
- In a large mixing bowl, combine the cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla extract, and salt.
- Mix the ingredients until smooth and creamy.

3. Spread the icing:
- Spread the cream cheese icing onto the desired cake or dessert.
- You can also use the icing as a filling for cupcakes or other baked goods.

4. Decorate the icing:
- If desired, you can add a dusting of powdered sugar or a drizzle of chocolate or caramel sauce to enhance the appearance of the cream cheese icing.

By following these steps, you can recreate the cream cheese icing in the image, which is a delicious and visually appealing topping for various desserts.

2ebd233008.gt:
For the sweet curry vinaigrette: In a small bowl, whisk together all vinaigrette ingredients.
Set aside.
For the quinoa salad: In a large bowl, stir together the quinoa and sweet curry vinaigrette until incorporated.
Fold in the carrots, sweet corn kernels, tomatoes, cucumber, squash, red bell pepper, and thyme.
Add kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste.

[/SYS]

1. Rinse the quinoa in a fine mesh strainer and drain well.
2. In a medium saucepan, combine the quinoa, water, and a pinch of salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 15-20 minutes or until the quinoa is cooked and the water is absorbed.
3. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let it sit, covered, for about 5 minutes. Fluff the quinoa with a fork.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together the ingredients for the sweet curry vinaigrette: 1/4 cup olive oil, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup rice vinegar, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1/4 cup grated ginger, 1/4 cup minced garlic, 1/4 cup grated onion, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, 1/4 cup chopped green onions, and 1/4 cup chopped red bell pepper.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, mixed vegetables, and the sweet curry vinaigrette. Toss to combine.
6. Season the salad with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the End of Summer Quinoa Salad immediately or refrigerate it for up to 24 hours before serving.

[/SYS]

67ac4adb11.gt:
Preheat your oven to 400 degrees F. Mix sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla.
Then, stir in flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda, cinnamon, cayenne pepper, and salt.
Form the dough into 1-inch balls.
For coating the cookie dough, mix the sugar and cinnamon.
Coat each dough ball with the mixture.
Place on an ungreased (or use a Silpat) cookie sheet.
Bake 8 to 10 minutes.
Cool 1 minute on the baking sheet, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3. Add the butter and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Gradually add the sugar, mixing until the dough comes together.
5. Roll the dough out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
7. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the cookies for 12-15 minutes, or until they are golden brown.
9. Remove the cookies from the oven and let them cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Mexican Snickerdoodles!

cd2f6516bb.gt:
For the crust; in a bowl combine all crust ingredients together until well blended.
Press into bottom of a 9-inch pie plate, or a 9-inch glass baking pan.
Bake 375 degrees F for 8-10 minutes; cool then place the empty crust into the freezer until ready to fill.
In a large bowl combine the soft ice cream with peanut butter until well combined, then mix in the frozen chopped peanut butter cups (if using) pour into the frozen pie crust, then sprinkle with chopped peanuts.
Return to the freezer until firm.
When the pie is completely frozen drizzle the magic shell on top.
Return to freezer until ready to use.
cd2f6516bb.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including the ice cream, chocolate sauce, and peanut butter.
2. Next, place the ice cream in a bowl and cover it with the chocolate sauce.
3. Add a layer of peanut butter on top of the chocolate sauce.
4. Optionally, you can add some crushed Reese's peanut butter cups for extra flavor and texture.
5. Place the bowl in the freezer for at least 1-2 hours or until the ice cream is fully frozen and the peanut butter is melted.
6. Once the dessert is fully frozen, scoop it into a bowl and enjoy your delicious kittencal's Reese's Peanut Butter-Chocolate Ice Cream Dessert.

f040d5fa02.gt:
For the cookies: Cream butter and sugar.
Add eggs and vanilla and mix well.
Add buttermilk and nutmeg and mix well.
Add dry ingredients and mix until incorporated.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake at 350 degrees F for 12-15 minutes.
For the glaze: Combine all glaze ingredients, stirring until smooth.
Drizzle small spoonfuls of glaze over cooled cookies.
Store cookies in an airtight container.
Recipe adapted from Buttermilk Cookies on Gourmet.com
f040d5fa02.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a smooth dough forms.
5. Fold in the nutmeg and buttermilk.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Nutmeg Buttermilk Cookies!

4cdb9f81ba.gt:
Add the creamed corn and water to a pot, and turn on the heat.
When the mixture starts to simmer, add the soy milk.
When the mixture starts to simmer again, add the consomme cube.
Once the consomme is dissolved, add the heavy cream.
Top with corn if you like, and done.
4cdb9f81ba.pred:
To prepare the corn soup shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: corn, soy milk, vegetable or chicken broth, onions, garlic, salt, pepper, and any additional desired flavorings or herbs.

2. Prepare the corn: Remove the corn kernels from the cob using a sharp knife or a corn stripper.

3. Prepare the soy milk: If using soy milk, make sure it is at room temperature. If using cow's milk, heat it until it reaches the desired temperature.

4. Prepare the broth: In a large pot, combine the vegetable or chicken broth with the onions, garlic, and any additional desired flavorings or herbs. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer.

5. Add the corn and soy milk: Slowly pour the soy milk into the pot, stirring continuously to prevent lumps. Add the corn kernels and continue stirring until the corn is heated through.

6. Season with salt and pepper: Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper as needed.

7. Serve: Serve the corn soup hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh herbs or a drizzle of cream, if desired.

By following these steps, you can prepare a delicious corn soup made with soy milk.

e02496cb22.gt:
Combine egg and milk.
Then spread flour, cayenne and cheese on a plate.
Season each fillet with salt and pepper.
Dip fillet in egg mixture, then in flour mixture, then in corn flakes.
Place on a baking sheet lightly sprayed with nonstick cooking spray.
Bake at 450F, 10 minutes per 1 inch fillet or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
e02496cb22.pred:

592c968c3a.gt:
Flatten chicken thighs.
MAKE PESTO: Microwave oil and garlic together on HIGH 40 seconds; process with basil through pepper in a food processor.
Spread about 1 tsp pesto down center of each thigh, leaving a 1/4-inch border on short ends.
Starting at a short end, roll each thigh up with pesto inside and secure with a toothpick.
Arrange rolls 1/2 inch apart, seam sides down, in a 13 x 9-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 375 until a cooking thermometer registers 170 (about 30 minutes), turning rolls after 15 minutes.
IMPORTANT: Cool, transfer to a covered container and refrigerate overnight.
Remove toothpicks and cut each roll crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices.

12. Serve the Pesto Chicken Spirals hot, and enjoy your delicious homemade meal!

b12f641798.gt:
Preheat oven to 350F with rack in middle.
Pat beef dry and season with 2 1/2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Heat oil in pot over medium-high heat until it shimmers, then brown meat, without crowding, in 3 batches, turning, about 8 minutes per batch.
Transfer to a platter.
Reduce heat to medium, then add carrots, celery, onions, and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until well browned, about 12 minutes.
Push vegetables to one side of pot.
Add tomato paste to cleared area and cook paste, stirring, 2 minutes, then stir into vegetables.
Add vinegar and cook, stirring, 2 minutes.
Stir in wine, bay leaves, and thyme and boil until wine is reduced by about two thirds, 10 to 12 minutes.
Add broth to pot along with water, beef, and any juices from platter and bring to a simmer.
Cover and braise in oven until meat is very tender, about 2 1/2 hours.
Set a large colander in a large bowl.
Pour stew into colander.
Return pieces of meat to pot, then discard remaining solids.
Let cooking liquid stand 10 minutes.
While beef braises, peel potatoes and cut into 1/2-inch-wide wedges.
Slice carrots diagonally (1-inch).
Add potatoes and carrots to stew (make sure they are submerged) and simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, until potatoes and carrots are tender, about 40 minutes.
b12f641798.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: beef, potatoes, carrots, onions, garlic, tomatoes, and broth.
2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. Cut the beef into bite-sized pieces and season with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
4. In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
5. Add the beef to the pot and cook until it is browned on all sides.
6. Add the garlic and cook for a few seconds, then add the potatoes, carrots, and any remaining ingredients.
7. Pour in the broth and bring the mixture to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for about 1.5 to 2 hours, or until the beef is tender and the vegetables are cooked through.
8. Serve the beef stew hot, garnished with fresh herbs or a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious beef stew with potatoes and carrots!

Preheat oven to 300.
Prepare some boiling water.
In a saucepan over medium heat, combine cream, banana puree and 2 T. sugar.
Cook, stirring occasionally until small bubbles appear around edges of pan.
Set aside.
In a bowl, beat egg yolks and vanilla until smooth and light.
Pour hot cream mixture into egg yolks, a little at a time, beating continuously until well blended.
Strain mixture through a fine sieve into a bowl.
Divide mixture among 4 ramekins.
Arrange ramekins in a baking pan and place on middle shelf of preheated oven.
Fill pan with boiling water to halfway up sides of ramekins.
Cover pan loosely with aluminum foil.
Bake until custard is just set, about 25 minutes.
(this took an additional 9 minutes for mine, as I have deeper ramekins) Chill 2-3 hours.
Slice bananas horizontally into 1/2" slices and arrange on top of chilled creme brulees.
Sprinkle remaining sugar over tops of bananas.
With cooking torch, move flame econtinuously over the surface of the ramekins, in a circular motion until sugar melts and becomes golden brown and bubbly.
(this is where I failed.
I was afraid to add the entire 1/3 cup sugar, so didn't get enough carmelized effect) Serve immediately.

Directions
1.
Clean blueberries and place in a stainless steel pan over medium heat.
2.
Add sugar.
3.
Bring to rolling boil, stirring constantly, and then bring heat down to low.
4.
Cook on low for five minutes or until blueberries are mostly liquid (there will be some remaining chunks of blueberries).
5.
Remove from heat, pour mixture into a bowl and place in fridge until cool (about 1 hour).
6.
Remove blueberry mixture from fridge, mix in creme fraiche.
7.
Pour blueberry creme fraiche mixture into ice cream maker, following machine instructions.
If you dont have an ice cream maker (I borrowed my friend Annes) then follow David Lebovitzs instructions for making ice cream without a machine.
3bcbe8be61.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients:
- Blueberries
- Creme Fraiche
- Ice Cream Maker
- Ice Cream Molds
- Ice Cream Mix
- Blender
- Whisk
- Measuring Cups
- Spatula
- Bowls
- Freezer

2. Wash and pick the blueberries, and place them in a blender.
3. Add the Creme Fraiche to the blender, and blend until smooth.
4. Pour the blended mixture into the ice cream maker, and place it in the freezer.
5. While the ice cream is churning, prepare the ice cream molds by placing them in the freezer.
6. After about 20-30 minutes, the ice cream will be ready. Remove the ice cream maker from the freezer, and carefully pour the ice cream mixture into the molds.
7. Place the molds back in the freezer, and let them freeze for at least 2 hours or until the ice cream is completely frozen.
8. Once the ice cream is fully frozen, remove it from the molds, and place it in the freezer for at least 2 hours more.
9. After the ice cream has been in the freezer for 2 hours, remove it from the freezer, and let it sit at room temperature for a few minutes.
10. Serve the Blueberry and Creme Fraiche Ice Cream immediately, and enjoy the delicious treat!

7a20842b45.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl using an electric mixer or stand mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add vanilla.
In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.
Add the flour mixture and bananas to the butter mixture in the mixer, alternating between the two.
Line each muffin cup with a paper liner.
Fill each muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter and bake for 17-20 minutes until a tester inserted into a cupcake comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool on a wire rack.
Let cupcakes cool completely before frosting.
For the frosting, using an electric mixer or stand mixer, cream butter until light and fluffy.
Add confectioners sugar 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add vanilla and milk and beat until frosting is well combined.
Add in strawberry preserves 1 tablespoon at a time until frosting is creamy.
Frost cooled cupcakes and store in the refrigerator.

415a9b7161.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F and line a 6-cup muffin pan.
Place the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the aroma is nutty and the milk solids start to turn brown on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
With a spatula, transfer the browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add the brown and white sugars, eggs and vanilla to the bowl and mix until combined.
Whisk together the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the browned butter mixture and mix until fully incorporated.
Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon the muffin batter into the paper cups.
Scatter the tops with a few of the cracked hazelnuts, while gently pressing them securely into place.
Bake for 15-18 minutes, until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let the muffins cool briefly in the pan, and then place them on a wire rack to cool.
415a9b7161.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and melted butter.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the chopped hazelnuts and raspberries.
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Hazelnut-Brown Butter Muffins with Raspberries!

615e73ba74.gt:
The best way to capture the elusive flavor of summertime.
Ben and Jerry prefer small peaches because they have more flavor and less water than the larger ones.
Combine the peaches, 1/2 cup of the sugar, and the lemon juice in a bowl.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, stirring the mixture every 30 minutes.
Remove the peaches from the refrigerator and drain the juice into another bowl.
Return the peaches to the refrigerator.
Whisk the eggs in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, 1 to 2 minutes.
Whisk in the remaining 3/4 cup sugar, a little at a time, then continue whisking until completely blended, about 1 minute more.
Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend.
Add the peach juice and blend.
Transfer the mixture to an ice cream maker and freeze following manufacturer's instructions.
After the ice cream stiffens (about 2 minutes before if is done) add the peaches, then continue freezing until the ice cream is ready.
Makes 1 generous quart.
615e73ba74.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients, including Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream, peaches, and any other required ingredients for the recipe.
2. Next, prepare the ice cream by scooping it into a bowl or a container with a lid.
3. Wash and peel the peaches, then slice them into small pieces.
4. In a blender or food processor, combine the peaches, ice cream, and any additional ingredients, such as sugar or vanilla extract, to create a smooth and creamy mixture.
5. Blend the mixture until it reaches the desired consistency.
6. Pour the mixture into a bowl or a container, and place it in the freezer to chill for at least 2 hours or until it reaches the desired consistency.
7. After the ice cream has chilled, scoop it into bowls or cones, and enjoy your homemade Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream!

Remember to follow any specific instructions or guidelines provided by the recipe, and adjust the ingredients or steps as needed to suit your preferences or dietary requirements.

0a605c19e8.gt:
Add everything but the shrimp to a gallon-sized freezer bag.
Seal the bag and shake well to combine.
Taste test for spiciness; add sriracha for more heat, and tomato paste and olive oil for less heat.
When youre happy with it, add the shrimp and marinate in the fridge for 45 minutes.
Dump the entire bag, marinade included, into a pre-heated frying pan.
Fry the shrimp until theyre curled up and no longer translucent, a couple of minutes on each side.
You can also skewer and grill the shrimp.
Serve over rice, pasta, udon, in lettuce wraps with carrot and sprouts, as an appetizer ...
0a605c19e8.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- Shrimp (fresh or frozen, peeled and deveined)
- Sriracha sauce (a spicy sauce made from chili peppers, garlic, and sugar)
- Vegetable oil (preferably peanut or canola oil)
- Salt and pepper
- Optional: garlic, ginger, or other seasonings, to taste

2. Prepare the equipment:
- A large skillet or frying pan
- A spatula or slotted spoon
- A plate or bowl for serving

3. Heat the oil in the skillet over medium heat.
4. Add the shrimp to the skillet, season with salt and pepper, and cook until they are pink and cooked through. This should take about 2-3 minutes per side.
5. While the shrimp are cooking, prepare the sriracha sauce by mixing the ingredients in a small bowl.
6. Once the shrimp are cooked, remove them from the skillet and place them on the plate or bowl.
7. Pour the sriracha sauce over the shrimp and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Sriracha Fried Shrimp meal!

2893fcfb35.gt:
Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat.
Spray with nonstick cooking spray.
Add the diced onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced apple and saute until tender, about 3 minutes.
Then remove from heat and set aside for the moment.
In a medium sized mixing bowl, melt the butter (you can do this in the microwave, heating for 30 seconds, stirring, then heating for additional 30 second increments if needed).
Then add the bread crumbs to the melted butter and toss to coat.
Into the bread crumb mixture, mix in the onion and apple.
Add the shredded cheese and mix to thoroughly combine.
Slice the pork chops lengthwise leaving about 1/2 an inch on one side still intact (you are basically making a pocket for the filling mixture).
Stuff pork chops with bread crumb mixture.
Secure the pork chops closed using toothpicks.
Spray each side of the pork chops with nonstick cooking spray and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the pork chops (or cook on a skillet) over medium to medium high heat until the juices run clear, about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from the grill and let rest about 5 minutes.
Remove toothpicks.
Serve and enjoy!
!
2893fcfb35.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork chops with salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs or spices.
3. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the diced apples and cook until they are soft and tender.
5. Add the pork chops to the skillet and cook until they are browned on both sides.
6. Remove the pork chops from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet.
7. Stuff each pork chop with the apple and onion mixture.
8. Return the pork chops to the skillet and cook for a few more minutes, until the stuffing is heated through.
9. Place the pork chops on the baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
10. Remove the pork chops from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious Sweet Apple and Onion Stuffed Pork Chops!

0ede22d38c.gt:
Chop onion and celery.
Saute celery and onion in vegetable oil in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat until tender.
Add chicken stock and frozen vegetables.
Cover and cook until vegetables are cooked, about 10 minutes.
If vegetables are too large, you may wish to cut them into smaller pieces.
Stir in cream of chicken soup, chicken and milk and heat through, stirring occasionally.
Cut cheese into chunks and add to soup, stirring until melted.
Taste and season if needed.
(It shouldnt need much if any salt.)
Serve immediately with crackers.
0ede22d38c.pred:
1. In a large pot, combine 1 cup of diced potatoes, 1 cup of diced carrots, and 1 cup of diced celery.
2. Add 2 cups of chicken or vegetable broth, and bring to a boil.
3. Reduce heat, and let simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
4. Add 1 cup of milk, and stir to combine.
5. Add 1/2 cup of heavy cream, and stir to combine.
6. Season with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
7. Serve the delicious Chunky Chowder hot.

[/INST]

dd8991d2f0.gt:
Bring water for noodles to boil in a large pot.
Cook noodles according to instructions on package, then drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil, and then add onion.
Saute onions for 10-15 minutes, over medium-low heat until lightly browned.
Add broccoli and 1/4 cup water.
Cover pan and saute 5 minutes or so until broccoli turns bright green and begins to soften.
Stir in garlic and salt.
Then stir in sesame oil, agave and ume vinegar.
In a small bowl, combine arrowroot and 1 tablespoon water, stirring vigorously to make a paste without any lumps.
Pour the paste over the broccoli and mix quickly and vigorously to loosen any of the mixture that sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Place noodles on individual plates, then top with broccoli mixture.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro and peanuts.
dd8991d2f0.pred:

6902fabddb.gt: Stir salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in an airtight container, seal, and shake to combine.

To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: salt, pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, and any other desired seasonings.
2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a small bowl, mix the seasoned salt ingredients together until well combined.
4. Spread the seasoned salt mixture evenly on a baking sheet or a lined baking sheet.
5. Bake the seasoned salt mixture in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until it reaches your desired crispiness.

To use the seasoned salt, sprinkle it over your desired dish, such as a salad, stir-fry, or any other meal that you would like to enhance with the flavors of the seasoned salt.

e766664a53.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F with a rack in the middle position.
Take a small slice off of the bottom of each potato so that they will sit flat, and then a small slice (about 1/4) from each end.
Make slices crosswise down the potato at 1/4 intervals, leaving 1/4 at the bottom.
Make sure you do not cut all the way through.
Rinse the sliced potatoes under cold running water, making sure water gets between each slice to wash away excess starch.
Place the potatoes on a plate, bottom side up, and microwave for 5 minutes (do not cover).
Flip the potatoes over, then microwave for another 5 minutes.
While the potatoes are in the microwave, make the topping.
Pulse the bread in a food processor until you have coarsely ground crumbs.
In a medium bowl, use a fork to mix the crumbs with the melted butter, cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, minced garlic, salt, and pepper until it forms a chunky paste.
Set aside.
When the potatoes are finished in the microwave, place them on a rimmed baking sheet.
Drizzle slowly with olive oil, so that it can run into the slices.
Fan the slices slightly, then dash each one with paprika, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 30 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked through and the edges are just starting to brown.
Remove from the oven and turn the broiler on.
Press the topping onto the top of the cooked potatoes, pressing into any slices that you easily can, but being careful not to rip the potatoes.
Place under the broiler for a couple of minutes, until the topping is bubbly and starting to brown.
e766664a53.pred:
To recreate the flavor packed potato fans, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the potatoes into thin slices, making sure not to cut all the way through.
3. Place the potato slices on a baking sheet, making sure they are not overlapping.
4. Drizzle the potato slices with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
5. Roast the potato slices in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
6. Remove the potato slices from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Carefully flip the potato slices over, and let them cool for a few more minutes.
8. Once the potato slices are cool enough to handle, carefully fold them in half to create the fan shape.
9. Serve the flavor packed potato fans immediately, as they are best enjoyed fresh.

Enjoy your delicious potato fans!

84dcc3c2e0.gt:
Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes and shake vigorously.
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.
84dcc3c2e0.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- Key limes
- Vodka
- Lemon juice
- Sugar
- Ice
- Garnish (optional)
2. Prepare the ingredients:
- Rinse the key limes and pat them dry.
- Juice the lemons and set aside.
- Combine the sugar and vodka in a shaker.
- Add ice to the shaker.
3. Shake the ingredients:
- Shake the ingredients vigorously for about 10-15 seconds.
4. Strain the mixture:
- Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice.
5. Garnish the drink:
- If desired, garnish the drink with a lemon slice or a lemon twist.
6. Enjoy your Key Lime Martini!

Please note that the photo may not be of the exact dish, but it is a representation of a Key Lime Martini.

b240a9e8bb.gt:
Heat oven to 250F degrees.
Mix together cornmeal, flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Combine egg whites, milk and margarine, mix well.
Pour milk mixture into the dry ingredients, stir until just smooth (do not over mix).
In a large non stick skillet heat the 2 tbsp oil, heat until quite hot but not smoking.
Drop in a 1/4 cup of batter for each fritter.
Cook approx 4-6 minutes on each side.
Keep warm in the oven covered with foil until you have cooked all the fritters.
Serve with Blueberries or other fruit.
b240a9e8bb.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: blueberries, cornmeal, flour, eggs, milk, baking powder, salt, and pepper.
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and milk together.
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the blueberries.
6. Heat a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
7. Pour the batter onto the skillet, creating small pancakes or fritters.
8. Cook the fritters for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
9. Serve the fritters warm, garnished with powdered sugar and a drizzle of syrup.

Enjoy your delicious pan fried blueberry corn fritters!

704ac085bf.gt:
Get the 2 slices of bread and the peanut butter and banana.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the slices of bread.
Slice up as much banna as the bread can fit on it.
Place the two slices of bread together.
And now it is ready to eat.
704ac085bf.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: peanut butter, bananas, bread, and a knife.
2. Spread peanut butter on one side of the bread.
3. Cut the bananas into slices, ensuring that you have enough for both sides of the bread.
4. Place the peanut butter-covered side of the bread on a flat surface.
5. Place the banana slices on the peanut butter-covered side of the bread.
6. If desired, add any desired toppings, such as jelly or honey.
7. Fold the bread over the banana slices to create a sandwich.
8. Cut the sandwich in half or in diagonal slices, depending on your preference.

Enjoy your delicious Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich!

1090169845.gt:
Preheat the over to 400F.
Divide the fish into 2 portions placing each in the center of a piece of foil (spraying the foil with some cooking oil is a good idea).
Salt and pepper to taste.
To each portion add pieces of pinched-off-the-stem fresh dill, a splash of lemon juice (or a slice of lemon) and half a pat of butter (optional).
Fold the foil into a packet by folding the edges up until they meet over the center and folding over to seal.
Put the packets in an oven dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove and serve.
1090169845.pred:
As a chef, I would first start by cleaning and preparing the fish. This involves removing the head, fins, and any bones. Next, I would season the fish with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices.

Once the fish is seasoned, I would heat a pan or skillet over medium heat and add a small amount of oil. When the pan is hot, I would place the seasoned fish in the pan and cook it until it's golden brown on both sides. This would take about 5-7 minutes.

After the fish is cooked, I would remove it from the pan and place it on a plate. The dish is now ready to be served and enjoyed.

Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can help you with.

b5d5eda997.gt:
Preheat oven to 325F
mix cake in bowl...following the directions on the box.
add jell-o pudding
add strawberry extract
add 1\2 can of strawberry frosting
pour mixture in a floured cake pan.
I used a bundt pan
bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
once cake has cooled, take the un-used portion of the frosting and microwave for 10 seconds.
stir and drizzle with spoon over cake

820cb37cdd.gt:
1.
Brown the onion in the olive oil until turning translucent.
Add the garlic.
2.
Add both sausage and beef, break into very small pieces and cook through.
3.
Add spices and seasonings, remove from heat.
Drain and cool.
In a food processor, add ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, and the sausage/ground beef mixture.
Process together until it reaches an almost paste-like consistency.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
Can also be frozen.
820cb37cdd.pred:
1. Begin by preheating your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the sausage and beef ravioli filling.
3. Add a generous amount of grated Parmesan cheese to the filling.
4. In a separate bowl, mix together the egg and a pinch of salt.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the sausage and beef ravioli filling, stirring gently to combine.
6. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the filling to set.
7. After 30 minutes, remove the bowl from the refrigerator and let it sit at room temperature for a few minutes.
8. Meanwhile, prepare a baking sheet by lining it with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
9. Once the filling is at room temperature, use a spoon to scoop out a small amount of filling and shape it into a small ball. Repeat this process until you have used up all the filling.
10. Place the shaped balls of filling on the prepared baking sheet.
11. Bake the ravioli in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
12. Remove the ravioli from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious sausage and beef ravioli filling!

b9b1d42894.gt:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Pour mixture over chicken in slow cooker.
Cook 3-4 hours on low.
Serve with no-yolk egg noodles.
Number of Servings: 4.
b9b1d42894.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 1 pound of boneless, skinless chicken breasts
- 1/2 cup of ranch dressing mix
- 1/4 cup of butter
- 1/4 cup of bacon bits
- 1/4 cup of grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/4 cup of chopped fresh parsley
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- 1/2 cup of water
- A slow cooker

2. Preheat the slow cooker:
- Place the chicken breasts in the slow cooker.
- Pour the water into the slow cooker.
- Place the lid on the slow cooker and preheat it on high for about 30 minutes.

3. Prepare the ranch dressing mix:
- In a small bowl, mix the ranch dressing mix with 1/4 cup of water.
- Set aside.

4. Prepare the bacon and Parmesan cheese:
- Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.
- Once the bacon is cooked, crumble it into small pieces.
- Grate the Parmesan cheese.

5. Assemble the dish:
- Once the chicken is cooked through, remove it from the slow cooker and shred it into bite-sized pieces.
- Stir the shredded chicken into the ranch dressing mixture.
- Add the crumbled bacon and grated Parmesan cheese to the chicken mixture.
- Season the mixture with salt and pepper, to taste.

6. Serve the dish:
- Serve the Bacon Ranch Slow Cooker Chicken over rice or noodles.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Bacon Ranch Slow Cooker Chicken!

1c2ae05e91.gt:
Cook/steam sliced carrots until fork-tender; drain and keep warm.
Preheat oven to 375.
Lightly grease/spray a 2 1/2 qt casserole dish; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, onion, cheese soup, milk, egg, cheese, crushed crackers, salt, pepper, tarragon and nutmeg; mix well.
Gently fold in the hot cooked carrots to the mixture.
Turn mixture into prepared casserole dish.
Bake, uncovered at 375 for 25-30 minutes.

8dfa9a04cc.gt:
In shallow bowl, mix flour, egg, vanilla, milk, and lemon jce.
Dip rings to cover.
In deep skillet heat oil to about 375*.
Fry rings, in batches of 3 or 4 for 2 1/2 minutes or until golden brown.
Place on paper towels and dust with sugar on both sides.

8c25573d0e.gt:
In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Beat in flour.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Roll out onto a well-floured surface to 1/4-in.
thickness.
Brush lightly with egg.
Sprinkle with almonds and sugar if desired.
Using a fluted pastry cutter or knife, cut into 2-in.
x 1-in.
strips.
Place 1 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-12 minute or until lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.
8c25573d0e.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the egg and vanilla extract, and mix well.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until a dough forms.
6. Chill the dough in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
7. Roll out the dough on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/4 inch (0.6 cm).
8. Cut out desired shapes using cookie cutters or a sharp knife.
9. Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
10. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden.
11. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Finnish Christmas Cookies with Almonds!

87f97ac544.gt:
Preheat oven to 350A.
Slice ham in half.
If using slices of cheese, cut in quarters.
Roll desired amount of ham and cheese up in each biscuit.
Use toothpick to hold in place.
Bake 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Feel free to stuff these with almost anything!
Little smokies sausages with cheese and a tsp of chili; slices of pepperoni with mozzarella and a tsp of pizza sauce or marinara, etc.
87f97ac544.pred:
As a chef, I would first gather the necessary ingredients for the dish, which include ham, cheese, biscuits, and possibly some additional ingredients such as onions, herbs, or spices. I would then preheat the oven to a suitable temperature, typically around 350°F (175°C).

Next, I would prepare the ham and cheese by slicing them into even pieces. If using onions or herbs, I would chop them finely.

To assemble the dish, I would start by spreading a layer of biscuit dough on a baking sheet or a similar surface. I would then place the ham and cheese slices on top of the dough, arranging them in a way that creates a visually appealing presentation.

To create the roll ups, I would use a biscuit cutter or a similar tool to cut out circles of dough, slightly larger than the ham and cheese pieces. I would place the cut-out dough circles on top of the ham and cheese, sealing the edges together to create a seamless, enclosed dish.

Once all the roll ups are assembled, I would carefully transfer them to the preheated oven and bake for approximately 12-15 minutes, or until the biscuit dough is golden brown and the ham and cheese are fully cooked.

After removing the dish from the oven, I would let it cool for a few minutes before serving it to enjoy the delicious combination of ham, cheese, and biscuit dough.

b188749dcd.gt:
Combine fennel seeds, cumin seeds, caraway seeds, cracked wheat, butter or margarine, molasses or barley malt, and orange zest in 1 1/3 cup of boiling water.
Soak for 1 hour.
(This pre-soaks the cracked wheat and pre-releases the other flavors.)
Add seed mixture along with baking soda, whole wheat or rye flour, high-gluten bread flour, dry yeast, gluten, and buttermilk powder into the pan of a bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Select the cycle for White Bread and the Light Crust setting.
Start.
b188749dcd.pred:
To cook the Limpa Bread, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine 2 cups of flour, 1 cup of warm water, 1/2 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup of salt, and 1/2 cup of vegetable oil. Mix the ingredients until they form a soft dough.
3. Knead the dough on a floured surface until it becomes smooth and elastic.
4. Cover the dough with a damp cloth and let it rest for about 30 minutes.
5. After the dough has rested, roll it out on a floured surface to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
6. Cut the dough into desired shapes using a cookie cutter or a sharp knife.
7. Place the shaped dough on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
8. Bake the Limpa Bread in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until it is golden brown and cooked through.
9. Remove the Limpa Bread from the oven and let it cool on a wire rack.

Enjoy your delicious Limpa Bread!

adf0775fd4.gt:
Bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil.
Fill a large bowl with ice water.
In another large bowl, whisk the shallot, vinegar and sour cream together.
Whisk in the olive oil until emulsified.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the sugar snap peas to the boiling water and blanch for 20 seconds.
Add the snow peas and cook for 20 seconds.
Add the frozen baby peas and cook for 20 seconds longer, until the sugar snaps and snow peas are crisp-tender and the baby peas are heated through.
Drain and immediately transfer the colander to the ice water to stop the cooking.
Drain again and pat the peas dry.
Add the peas to the dressing, season with salt and pepper and toss to coat.
Serve.
adf0775fd4.pred:
[/SYS]

To cook the Three-Pea Salad, follow these steps:

1. Rinse the peas thoroughly under cold water.
2. In a large bowl, combine the rinsed peas, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
3. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
4. Pour the dressing over the pea mixture and toss to coat evenly.
5. Allow the salad to marinate for about 15-20 minutes in the refrigerator.
6. Serve the Three-Pea Salad immediately or refrigerate for up to 24 hours before serving.

This simple yet delicious salad can be enjoyed as a side dish or a light meal. The combination of peas, cherry tomatoes, and red onion creates a vibrant and refreshing flavor profile that is perfect for warm weather or any occasion.

1296229d55.gt:
Pick your favorite way of preparing meat.
I sliced a thick steak and put this in a foil pouch.
This would work well in a pressure cooker, too.
Place meat, sauces, seasoning and sugar together.
Adjust the amounts to your preferences.
The sugar makes the meat more tender and is perfect for tough cuts.
Cook until meat is done.
Add feta cheese and cover to let cheese melt.
Serve with pasta, rice or potatoes and don't plan on leftovers!
1296229d55.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 1 lb of chicken
- 1/2 cup of soy sauce
- 1/4 cup of lemon juice
- 1/4 cup of honey
- 1/4 cup of olive oil
- 1/4 cup of minced garlic
- 1/4 cup of grated ginger
- 1/4 cup of chopped onion
- 1/4 cup of chopped green onion
- 1/4 cup of chopped cilantro
- 1/4 cup of chopped parsley
- 1/4 cup of chopped red bell pepper
- 1/4 cup of chopped green bell pepper
- 1/4 cup of chopped carrot
- 1/4 cup of chopped celery
- Salt and pepper to taste

2. Prepare the marinade:
- In a large bowl, mix the soy sauce, lemon juice, honey, olive oil, minced garlic, grated ginger, and chopped onion.
- Add the chicken to the marinade and toss to coat evenly.

3. Marinate the chicken:
- Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or a lid, and refrigerate the chicken for at least 1 hour or up to 4 hours.

4. Cook the chicken:
- Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
- Remove the chicken from the marinade and pat it dry with paper towels.
- Place the chicken on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
- Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).

5. Serve the dish:
- Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into thin pieces.
- Serve the chicken with the marinade, and enjoy your delicious, homemade Amazing Marinade dish.

4f880f7c86.gt:
Add the kinako and sugar to a bowl and combine well.
Then add the soy milk (or milk) to the bowl as well and cream everything together with a rubber spatula.
If the mixture is too dry, try adding some more milk.
Once mixed, wrap it in some cling film and squeeze and shape the mixture together with your hands so that the mixture forms a ball.
Once the mixture has reached a consistency where it can be shaped into a ball with your bare hands, shape the mixture into whatever shapes you like I usually roll mine out with a rolling pan over the cling film then slice it into pieces.
You can replace the sugar with brown sugar if you like.
Feel free to sprinkle the kinako truffles with kinako powder, cinnamon, or anything that comes to mind at the end as well.
4f880f7c86.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: kinako (soybean flour), truffle oil, and a small amount of water.
2. In a small bowl, mix the kinako and water until you have a smooth, slightly runny batter.
3. Dip the truffle pieces into the batter, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Heat a small amount of truffle oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
5. Carefully place the coated truffle pieces into the hot oil, ensuring they don't stick together.
6. Cook the truffle pieces until they are golden brown and crispy, flipping them occasionally to ensure even cooking.
7. Remove the truffle pieces from the oil and drain them on a paper towel.
8. Serve the kinako truffles immediately, as they will become soggy if left in the oil for too long.

[/SYS]

68d4e3063b.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F
Clean wing sections, salt and pepper, I stay light on the salt because the sauce adds some also.
Spread wings out on baking sheet, place in preheated oven for about 45 minutes.
About 5 minutes before the wings are done, in a small container (I use a coffee mug) mix the sauce ingredients.
I put a little sauce in a big enough bowl to hold the wings and mix them.
Add about 1/3 wings, about 1/3 sauce, same thing twice more.
I find that just makes it easier to evenly coat the wings.
If you want to add a little chart to the coating, you can broil the wings for a minute per side, keep an eye on them do you don't over do it.
My daughter does not like it that way, so we skip this step when she is home.
Serve immediately.
68d4e3063b.pred:
To cook the Heidi's Asian BBQ Ranch Wings, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 425°F (220°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the marinade ingredients: soy sauce, oyster sauce, hoisin sauce, garlic, ginger, and brown sugar.
3. Add the chicken wings to the marinade and toss to coat evenly. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.
4. Remove the chicken wings from the marinade and pat them dry with paper towels.
5. Heat a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add a small amount of oil to the pan, and cook the chicken wings until they are golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
6. Remove the chicken wings from the pan and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
7. Return the pan to the heat and add a small amount of oil. Add the onions, bell peppers, and mushrooms, and cook until they are tender, about 5-7 minutes.
8. Add the marinated chicken wings back to the pan, and toss to combine with the vegetables.
9. Pour the marinade over the chicken wings and vegetables, and cook for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
10. Serve the Heidi's Asian BBQ Ranch Wings immediately, garnished with sesame seeds and green onions if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Asian BBQ Ranch Wings!

c813791325.gt:
In a food processor, combine the garlic and cucumber and process until finely minced.
Add the yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill and salt and pepper to taste.
Process until well blended, then transfer to a bowl.
Taste to adjust the seasonings if needed.
Cover and refrigerate until needed (recipe yields 1 cup).
c813791325.pred:
To cook the Vegan Snacktime: Baked Eggplant Fries, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut the eggplant into thin slices, and pat them dry with a paper towel.
3. In a small bowl, mix together some olive oil, salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs (e.g., oregano, basil, or thyme).
4. Dip each eggplant slice into the olive oil mixture, ensuring that it's evenly coated.
5. Place the coated eggplant slices on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper or a silicone mat.
6. Bake the eggplant slices in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy.
7. Remove the baked eggplant slices from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Vegan Snacktime: Baked Eggplant Fries!

91462bb341.gt:
Preheat oven to 400.
Combine bread crumbs, Italian seasoning and garlic powder in shallow dish.
Dip chicken in egg, then crumb mixture; turn to coat.
Arrange chicken in 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Bake 20 minutes.
Pour Sauce over chicken; top with cheese.
Bake an additional 10 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
Serve over spaghetti.
91462bb341.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).

7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it and serving.

88e444eb93.gt:
Preheat oven to broil.
Line a baking sheet with foil.
Halve the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapeno peppers, and serrano peppers lengthwise and discard stems and seeds.
Place on baking sheet and brush the peppers with olive oil.
Roast peppers under the broiler until the skin blackens and blisters, 3 to 5 minutes.
Place peppers in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap; allow the peppers to steam until the skins loosen, about 10 minutes.
Peel skin off the peppers and discard.
Combine the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapenos, serrano, onion, tomato, garlic, cilantro, diced tomato with juice, lime juice, salt, black pepper, and beer in a blender.
Blend to desired consistency.
Transfer to a bowl and allow to cool in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving.

Strain plums through a sieve over a bowl, reserving juice.
Cut plums in half; discard pits.
Combine plums, reserved juice, red wine, honey, cinnamon, and cloves in a medium saucepan.

Place 3/4 cup soup into each of 6 wine goblets.
Top each serving with 1 tablespoon yogurt and 1 mint sprig, if desired.

8b290d6b5c.gt:
Preheat oven to 330 degrees F (165C).
Butter and flour a 10 inch bundt pan.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt.
In large bowl, cream butter with sugar until light and fluffy (no less than 6 minutes).
Add eggs; beat until smooth.
Add flour mixture alternately with yoghurt (or sour cream); beat until smooth.
Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake about 1 hour, or until tester comes out with a few moist crumbs attached.
Preheat broiler.
Combine brown sugar, butter, almonds, coconut, milk and vanilla.
Spoon mixture over top of cake.
Place under broiler, 3 inches from heat source until lightly browned.
WATCH VERY CAREFULLY as this can go from caramelly to burned in no time!
8b290d6b5c.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add the eggs, milk, and vanilla extract, and mix until well combined.
4. Gradually add the spices, such as cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice, and mix until well combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured cake pan.
6. Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
7. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.

0349f80c73.gt:
Mix all ingredients (using a hand mixer will get the lumps out).
Chill.
Serve!
0349f80c73.pred:
As a chef, I would first gather all the necessary ingredients for the dish, which includes spinach, sour cream, and a baking dish. I would then preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).

Next, I would start by sautéing the spinach in a pan with a little bit of oil until it is wilted and cooked through. Once the spinach is cooked, I would remove it from the pan and set it aside.

In the same pan, I would add the sour cream and stir it until it is smooth and creamy. I would then add the sautéed spinach back into the pan, stirring to combine the ingredients.

I would then pour the spinach and sour cream mixture into the baking dish, which should be large enough to hold the entire mixture. I would bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is hot and bubbly, and the edges are slightly crispy.

Once the dip is cooked, I would remove it from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving it. This delicious spinach dip can be enjoyed with pita chips, tortilla chips, or even as a topping for sandwiches or wraps.

3a73e25c27.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Crumble the sausage into a saucepan over low heat; cover and cook until sausage is completely browned, stirring every 30 seconds; drain.
Place the bread on a baking sheet with the crust sides down.
Arrange the cooked sausage evenly over both halves of bread.
Top each with tomato slices, red bell pepper strips, mozzarella slices, green olives, and black olives.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes.
Whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, oregano, basil, salt, pepper, onion, and garlic in a bowl.
Drizzle over baked bread halves.
Bake another 5 minutes.
Cut into 2 inch slices to serve.

68fde60a06.gt:
In Dutch oven, place beef, onion, garlic, salt and pepper.
Combine water and tomato paste; pour over beef mixture.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low.
Cover tightly and simmer 1 3/4 to 2 hours or until beef is tender.
Remove beef from cooking liquid; cool slightly.
Meanwhile skim fat from cooking liquid, if necessary.
Trim and discard excess fat from cooked beef.
Shred beef with 2 forks.
In Dutch oven, combine 2 cups cooking liquid, steak sauce, brown sugar and cornstarch mixture.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes or until slightly thickened.
Add shredded beef; mix well.
Continue to cook until thoroughly heated, stirring occasionally.
Place equal amounts of beef mixture on bottom half of each bun.
Sprinkle with green onions and close with top half of bun.
Serve with additional steak sauce, if desired.
Makes 12 servings (serving size: 1 sandwich).
68fde60a06.pred:
1. First, preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Next, take a large skillet and heat it over medium heat. Add a small amount of oil to the skillet.
3. Once the skillet is hot, add the ground beef and cook until it is browned and cooked through. Season the beef with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
4. Once the beef is cooked, remove it from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add a small amount of oil and cook the onions until they are soft and translucent.
6. Add the cooked beef back to the skillet and mix everything together.
7. Next, take a large baking sheet and spread a layer of bread on it.
8. Add the cooked beef mixture on top of the bread, and then add a layer of cheese on top of the beef.
9. Repeat the layering process with the remaining bread and cheese.
10. Bake the sandwiches in the preheated oven for about 10-15 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
11. Remove the sandwiches from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes before cutting them into halves.
12. Serve the Half-Time Shredded Beef Sandwiches warm and enjoy!

These instructions will help you prepare a delicious and satisfying meal using the ingredients provided.

To Marinate: Put chicken breasts in a nonporous glass dish or bowl.
Drizzle melted butter or margarine over chicken and season with salt and ground black pepper.
Cover dish and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Put potato chip crumbs in a shallow dish or bowl.

Cook macaroni according to box, pour into colander and leave.
